Our StoryHello!We are Adam and Davis, owners of crown flora studio.  We started crown flora studio six years ago and worked out of our home studio to make unique bags, accessories and floral arrangements.  We traveled to craft shows and flea markets across Toronto and from Ottawa to Montreal to sell our work.  On Dec. 23, 2012, we opened our first shop in the Parkdale area of Toronto.We started off with an ironing board, a desk, some vintage crates and two chairs.  Our stock was minimal back then but we had enough to sell once the doors opened.   As the months went by and more plants and bags started to fill the shop it wasn't as scary as we thought to have a brick and mortar store.  Our little shop in Parkdale became a place for plant lovers and supporters of handmade products.As we expanded our products and added workshops, custom work and floral arrangements for events, we realized we could no longer do as much as we wanted to in our small space.  We had big plans and wanted to share it with everyone who became a part of our story.  We planted a seed with crown flora and needed to nurture it and let it grow.  Crown flora has bloomed and is ready to grow.The PerksWe've enlisted our amazing crew of creative friends to offer unique perks in addition to our own list of items for you to experience.  Here are some of the perks and workshops available for this campaign:dinosaur planterThese cute quirky dinosaur planters are sure to liven up any space.  Great for patio parties or a child's bedroom.  These multi coloured dinosaur planters are a great addition to your crown flora plant collection.  All planters come planted and made out of plastic for durability.bookhou planterSpecial perk alert!  Be sure to make this Bookhou printed plant holder an addition to your home.  Group them together or maybe one in your office.  This adds colour and some green to your space.  the bucket bagThis bucket bag will sure to be one of your staples for everyday or travel.  Made with waxed canvas and leather this bag can go from cross body to handle at anytime.  Be sure to grab one!ultimate event spaceDo you have a celebration coming up?  We will open up our unique space  for your private event. Pick a date for this year and celebrate with your friends and family.  Crown Flora Studio will provide floral decor, up to 3 centrepieces and 2 large arrangements. the camper bagThe Camper bag has been the newest bag from our collection.  Take this little yet versatile bag on your travels.  The detachable straps allows you to use it as travel bag for toiletries and more.  Be sure to pick this one up in Charcoal Grey this summer!kid icarus Ontario posterDiscover Ontario with this poster from our friends at Kid Icarus in Kensington Market.crywolf limited printCommemorate our campaign with this limited collaboration print made by Crywolf in their studio at 91 Ossington Ave. flower crown workshopGet ready to be surrounded with the most amazing flowers in this fun workshop.  Planning a wedding or want to enjoy your pretty flower crown?  Be sure to join us in this fun workshop.classic terrarium workshopJoin us for this classic workshop that we've been running since the start of our business.  You will get to make 2 types of terrariums in our new space.Your initials in GoldGet this lovely leather pouch monogrammed with your initials in gold!  Great for a night in the city or travelling abroad.(PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU MESSAGE ME WITH YOUR INITIALS AS THERE IS NO FIELD TO ADD IT)  THANK YOU :)shibori workshopJoin Arounna from Bookhou for this workshop using different resist techniques like tying, sewing and clamping to create a pattern on their scarves.  All materials are included.  You will receive %10 off the shop the day of the workshop.What We Need We need $10,000 for our campaign which we plan to use for renovations in order to offer our loyal clientele a better experience with new products, workshops and retail space.We will be installing proper lighting so that our space is well lit for workshops and in the retail area.We will be using a local carpenter to build a custom seating area for workshops. This will double as a work table for production of crown flora products.  Chairs, shelving and storage areas for workshops will be purchased as well.We will also be getting sewing equipment for our bag and home production as we will be producing new accessories and home products.In addition to our urban garden department we will be adding a flower shop. We will be purchasing a flower fridge to house our daily flowers for wedding/special events and local flower pick up for the neighbourhood.The money raised will also go to general renovation items such as painting, shelving and display tables for the retail area.
The ImpactIn moving to a larger space we hope that we can continue to grow and make people happy with our vision to be a community business specializing in hand made and creative products.  We want to become a community space for people to learn our craft and see the importance of sustainable and handmade work. We want to create an environment that is unique and special for everyone to be apart of.  We hope that you can contribute and see the growing result.Other Ways You Can HelpWe grew our business from word of mouth and social media.  Share our video, our story or tell all your friends what we are doing at crown flora studio.  Use Instagram, Twitter, Facebook or whatever social media platform you use to get our story across and reach other networks.We want to THANK YOU -- all of you -- for your support over the past years until now.  Thank you for checking out our campaign and we hope we make our goal with your help!xoAdam Mallory and Davis Khounnoraj

story:
We are a part of the amazing BRIKA maker community. Read our story and check out our feature here! 


Since we began in May 2011, we've grown faster than we could have imagined. Just two years after listing our first item on Etsy, our jewelry and lifestyle accessories are now stocked in over 30 incredible boutiques around the world, and have received national press and accolade. Eighty hour work weeks, innovative product design, creative marketing prowess and ingenuity have turned Son of a Sailor into a full-fledged business. Collaboration, an appreciation for fun and lightheartedness, and a holistic approach to employment are propelling that business forward. 

We've launched this Indiegogo campaign to raise funds that will allow us to attend our first wholesale tradeshow, POOL, in Las Vegas. We expect the resulting growth in wholesale to help us provide full-time employment for our existing production staff, allow us to begin offering benefits, and grow our business in a meaningful way. You can help by pledging and taking advantage of some exclusive Son of a Sailor designs!

/// OUR STORY \\\

In essence, Son of a Sailor began the day that William and Jessica met. She was an Austin transplant living in San Francisco, and he was visiting the city to see his friend, her roommate. After spending a day doing art projects on the floor of her bedroom, a relationship began to form. William and Jessica spent 10 months dating long-distance before she decided to return to Austin. Upon her return, they began making jewelry together, and Son of a Sailor was born. Within the scope of a year, they bought a house, started a business and became engaged to be married...it was all a bit of a whirlwind!

The response to the jewelry and the new line of accessories, Son of a Sailor Supply, has been overwhelming. The business has grown tremendously over two years, and William and Jessica have been met with ever-increasing demand for their products. With three production assistants working with them out of an East Austin studio, the growth doesn't seem to be waning. It is a pivotal time for Son of a Sailor, and we'd love for you to be a part of the excitement.

 

Check out the video above to get the full story of Son of a Sailor!

/// WHAT WE DO \\\

We began making jewelry in May 2010. Always inspired by natural materials with rich provenance, we both love adding bold color and geometric form to our pieces. We experiment with new techniques and unexpected combinations. Our first collection, now fondly referred to as our Classics, was received with great enthusiasm. We were some of the first jewelry designers to hand paint geometric brass elements, adding an exciting field of color to our metal jewelry. We have always embraced color and pattern, which became evident in a new way in our next collection, Polaris. We began employing beading techniques and hand-stamping to our metalworking, creating paint inlays that give a whole new dimension to our metal pieces. 

We are constantly thinking of new items we'd like to make, and ways that we want to express our aesthetic. Launching Son of a Sailor Supply last November allowed us to have a home for all of the ideas that we have beyond the jewelry. Our love for color and form is now applied to men's accessories, like knives and shaving kits, which have been met with open arms by our customers! From USB drives to leather key fobs, Son of a Sailor Supply is a gift shop for both men and women.

Between both shops, we hope to provide items that make people happy. We strive to remain affordable and accessible, use the highest quality materials, apply the most skilled craftsmanship possible to each item we make, and have fun doing it. 

/// OUR GOALS \\\

We realized that we would need help if we were going to meet the increasing demand for our products. It was also clear to us from the beginning that we wanted to take a holistic approach to employment. This business was born out of a meaningful relationship between its founders, and it only makes sense that the people Son of a Sailor employs are valued beyond simply their skill and labor. 

We want to provide full-time creative employment to the people we bring on. We want to provide access to health care. We want to make sure that working for a small creative business in Austin doesn't mean that our employees have to sacrifice some of the basic needs of todays society. This is not an easy task for small business owners these days.

As we bring on employees that are interested in growing with Son of a Sailor, if we are able to nourish their lives in the process, we feel that there are few bounds to what we can do as a company. We want to continue creating, bringing new ideas to fruition, and presenting the best products we can to our audience.

 

visit our website to see more Son of a Sailor

read a beautiful story about us on Madesmith

 

/// HOW WE'LL USE OUR FUNDS \\\

  • Our primary goal with the funds that we hope to raise through this campaign is to pay for our attendance at POOL Tradeshow, a wholesale show that we hope will allow us to grow our wholesale business in a large way. The show is expensive, and is a big jump for a business of our size. We believe this is the right time, though, to present our brand to stores and boutiques around the world. We've grown our wholesale business organically, and are proud to be represented in some amazing establishments. But POOL promises to put Son of a Sailor in front of a much larger retail audience. The money raised will pay for our booth fee and travel expenses to attend the show in late August. The booth fee alone is $4,000, and with travel, lodging, and build-out, we anticipate that it will end up costing about $6,000. The remaining amount from the campaign will cover fees, taxes, and production of rewards.
  • With the business we hope to generate at POOL, we would like to employ our existing production assistants full-time, and bring on one or two more members to our team. We would love to see this happen in the next two to three months. 
  • We would also like to begin providing a monthly health-care stipend for each employee so that they may have greater access to insurance by the end of this year.
  • The next big step for Son of a Sailor is to add more studio space. We began out of a back room in our home, and just recently graduated to a true studio space in an East Austin complex. Almost as soon as we got settled in, we realized that the demand that Supply was facing meant that we still needed the space at home, in addition to the new studio! We are busting at the seams, and if we are funded beyond our initial amount, we have plans to build out a new studio space for Son of a Sailor Supply. 

 

/// OUR PERKS \\\

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

/// THANKS! \\\

We would be remiss not to thank a number of people that have helped us with this Indiegogo campaign!

We were so lucky to be able to work with Fine Blend Media in the creation of our video. Chad and Ricardo were such a joy to work with, and created a work of art that far exceeded our expectations.

Our great friend David Hawkins is the man behind the smile-inducing music that's playing in the video. We're so excited that he was able to compose the perfect piece of music for us!

Sumeera Rasul and the folks at Madesmith have been invaluable to us throughout this process. Not only did they write one of the most beautiful pieces about Son of a Sailor that's ever been written, they've helped us as we navigate the challenges of a fast-growing business.

Kirsten, Caitlin, and Kelsey have been such amazing additions to the Son of a Sailor team. Their commitment and dedication to their jobs makes it easy to want to see them succeed with us! We love that you ladies are at once willing to work so hard and laugh so much with us---thanks!

And lastly, here's to all of you who want to join us in this exciting endeavor. We hope that the exclusively designed pieces we've created and the promise of helping a small business succeed are motivation enough for you to help us reach our goal!

story:
What is Endeavor Tiny House Retreats?

Endeavor is based on the idea that unforgettable adventure shouldn't have to cost a fortune. Our overall goal is to create a network of contemporary tiny homes throughout the most naturally beautiful areas of the Midwest. Our unique homes will blur the line between camping and staying in a luxury cabin and will truly deliver an experience to remember.

 

This campaign is to help us launch our first unit, Endeavor One, in northern Minnesota. Overlooking one of our states most prized natural wonders, Lake Superior, our first tiny home is designed with you in mind and combines all the fun of camping in the great outdoors with the must-have amenities of a modern hotel. From the private outdoor cooking and dining areas with lake view to the interior kitchen and spacious home big enough to sleep 4, Endeavor aims to deliver one thing: an unforgettable north shore experience for our guests. 

By contributing to our campaign, you're helping us reimagine the way we explore this great state.

 

 

WHY ARE WE FUNDING ON INDIEGOGO?

Our tiny home and property have already been purchased and are even getting near outright completion. We are funding on Indiegogo to assist in financing the property development phase which is currently underway.

Bringing a lot from raw land to fully functional living space means that we have to run underground utilities including electric, water, fiber optics and septic lines. This process is very expensive and all contributions & pre-orders will go directly to supporting those costs along with building a deck, purchasing furniture, linens & other extra amenities we will provide to you as our guest when you stay at Endeavor One!

 

Actual photo of Endeavor One taken upon delivery on 5/4/18.

There will soon be a 400 sqft deck that wraps around the home and will provide space for grilling food and will feature string lighting and plenty of outdoors seating space!

 

Have Questions or Need Clarification?

Contact Tyler, our Founder, directly at Tyler@EndeavorTinyHomes.com and he will respond within 24 hours! Keep in mind that many answers can be found by reading this entire page. :)

 

Curious If Your Ideal Dates Are Still Available?

Our up to date availability calendar can be seen near the bottom of this page!

 

 

All the Fun of Camping, None of the Hassle!

Escaping your daily grind doesn't mean you have to give up the comforts of home. Endeavor One will blur the line between camping and staying in a cabin by providing all the freedom and flexibility of camping with the added benefit of modern amenities you'll love!

Camp Site Style Amenities:

  • Fire Pit with Cooking Grate
  • Picnic Table for Outdoor Meals
  • Private Wooded Lot
  • Lake Superior Views
  • Place to Set Up a Tent
  • Provided Camp Fire Cookware & More!

Cabin Style Amenities:

  • Two Queen Beds
  • Bathroom with Shower
  • Kitchen with Stove Top & Fridge
  • Clean Linens Provided
  • Indoor Cookware Provided
  • TV with Wifi & Streaming Services
  • Air Conditioning & Central Heat
  • On Demand Hot Water & More!

 

 

Road Trip Anyone?

There are so many incredible experiences to be had on Minnesota's North Shore. Our lake view lot is located just 1 hour north of Duluth and is perched atop a beautiful granite bluff nearly 10 stories above lake level. Just 1/4 mile down the road is Tettegouche State Park which boasts stunning waterfalls, miles of scenic hiking trails and access to Lake Superior's vast shoreline. In addition, we are less than 30 minutes from the famous Gooseberry Falls, Split Rock Lighthouse, Palisade Head Lookout and many more incredible destinations to explore. A full activity guide will be available in the home when you arrive including exclusive coupons for rentals, tours, activities, restaurants and more.

Looking for something more? Take your trip a bit further north with an hour drive to Lutsen Mountains Ski Area, Superior National Golf Course or Grand Marais' famous restaurants & Breweries. Finish your day trip by returning to your beautiful tiny home to cook dinner over the open fire, enjoy some delicious s'mores and admire the untamed night sky.

 

 

Explore the MUST SEE sites that are just minutes from Endeavor One! Pictured below are Tettegouche State Park, Gooseberry Falls and Palisade Head/Shovel Point. (in that order)

 

 

2-Night Weekend Stay Giveaway!

As part of our gold, platinum and diamond perks packages, we are giving away a FREE 2-Night Weekend Stay to one lucky Indiegogo backer! For each package you receive a number of entries into the random drawing to win this getaway valued at over $400. The giveaway includes two free weekend nights (Friday & Saturday) and all cleaning fees, so the stay is completely free if you win. The lucky winner will be able to choose any weekend that works for their schedule and can have up to 3 additional guests to #CampfireAndChill with!

 

 

Pet Friendly!

What's a vacation without your dog?! Bring your furry companion with you during your adventure to the north! The hiking trails are the perfect place for them to explore too. Plus, we will have waste bags available outside the home for when your four legged friend does their business. ;)

 

 

You're Part of the Team!

In order to make Endeavor a reality, we need your help. Your contributions will allow us to create the most immersive space possible indoors & out. The tiny home and property have already been purchased, but your contributions will directly support the costs of land development and also to the additional amenities we would love to offer when you stay at Endeavor One.

By supporting Endeavor Tiny House Retreats, you're not only backing our vision, you are also becoming an indispensable part of our team. Your insights and feedback will help us create a destination that will be unlike any other in Minnesota!

 

 

Backer Contributions Will Go Towards:

  • Property Development Costs: Leveling the home site, running utilities to home, building a deck, landscaping & more.
  • Indoor & Outdoor Furnishings: Mattresses, linens, cookwares, indoor/outdoor seating, outdoor lighting & more.
  • Unique Extras: If we're able to raise enough, we would also love to add additional amenities to really push the guest experience at Endeavor to the next level. Some of those extras include outdoor bluetooth speakers, unique lounge swings, professional anti-mosquito treatments or even a climate controlled stargazing dome!

The more funds we raise, the more of these awesome amenities we can provide. Your support now will provide a more immersive experience at Endeavor when we open this June! 

 

If I Back Your Campaign, How Soon Can I Book My Stay?

Those who back our Indiegogo campaign with any package that includes advance booking in the description will receive an email within 48 hours asking which days they would like to schedule their stay. Dates will be on a first come, first serve basis so the sooner you back us, the more likely you are to get your ideal dates!

For those backers that contribute $75 or less, our Airbnb booking will open in May 2018 and your discount vouchers can be redeemed then! Make sure to subscribe to our newsletter for the most current information about the exact date our Airbnb booking page goes live. :)

 

 

 

Project Challenges

Though we already have most of the building blocks in place, there are always challenges with a project of this size. The biggest challenge we face is the timeline. Weather and temperature will play an important role in how soon the property development phase can be completed. That said, the amount of development needed is relatively small and should only take a matter of weeks to complete.

Our team is ready to get to work as soon as possible. As for the tiny home itself, it is currently being built off site and will be delivered to our property once completed (Mid-May 2018). Overall, we are extremely optimistic that we will meet our expected timeline to begin accepting guests in June of 2018.

 

Our Proud Partners!

 

 

Get Involved!

Love this idea, but can't back us? No problem, your support alone means the world to us. Help us spread the word by following and sharing our social media accounts or just telling your friends about Endeavor.

Here are some great ways to get involved.

  • Like us on Facebook at Follow us on Instagram @Endeavor_TinyHomes
  • Subscribe to our newsletter at EndeavorTinyHomes.com
  • Share this Indiegogo campaign on your social media
  • Tell a friend who would love to spend a weekend in our beautiful tiny home
  • Shop our unique, north shore themed merch at EndeavorTinyHomes.com
  • Email us and say hi, we would love to hear from you!

 

 

Thank You!

Thank you so much for taking the time to learn about our project. Your support is truly appreciated!

Learn more at EndeavorTinyHomes.com

Just 1/4 mile down the road is Tettegouche State Park which boasts stunning waterfalls, miles of scenic hiking trails and access to Lake Superior's vast shoreline. In addition, we are less than 30 minutes from the famous Gooseberry Falls, Split Rock Lighthouse, Palisade Head Lookout and many more incredible destinations to explore. A full activity guide will be available in the home when you arrive including exclusive coupons for rentals, tours, activities, restaurants and more.
Looking for something more? Take your trip a bit further north with an hour drive to Lutsen Mountains Ski Area, Superior National Golf Course or Grand Marais' famous restaurants & Breweries. Finish your day trip by returning to your beautiful tiny home to cook dinner over the open fire, enjoy some delicious s'mores and admire the untamed night sky.
 

 
Explore the MUST SEE sites that are just minutes from Endeavor One! Pictured below are Tettegouche State Park, Gooseberry Falls and Palisade Head/Shovel Point. (in that order)
 



 
2-Night Weekend Stay Giveaway!
As part of our gold, platinum and diamond perks packages, we are giving away a FREE 2-Night Weekend Stay to one lucky Indiegogo backer! For each package you receive a number of entries into the random drawing to win this getaway valued at over $400. The giveaway includes two free weekend nights (Friday & Saturday) and all cleaning fees, so the stay is completely free if you win. The lucky winner will be able to choose any weekend that works for their schedule and can have up to 3 additional guests to #CampfireAndChill with!
 

 
Pet Friendly!
What's a vacation without your dog?! Bring your furry companion with you during your adventure to the north! The hiking trails are the perfect place for them to explore too. Plus, we will have waste bags available outside the home for when your four legged friend does their business. ;)
 

 
You're Part of the Team!
In order to make Endeavor a reality, we need your help. Your contributions will allow us to create the most immersive space possible indoors & out. The tiny home and property have already been purchased, but your contributions will directly support the costs of land development and also to the additional amenities we would love to offer when you stay at Endeavor One.
By supporting Endeavor Tiny House Retreats, you're not only backing our vision, you are also becoming an indispensable part of our team. Your insights and feedback will help us create a destination that will be unlike any other in Minnesota!
 

 
Backer Contributions Will Go Towards:


Property Development Costs: Leveling the home site, running utilities to home, building a deck, landscaping & more.

Indoor & Outdoor Furnishings: Mattresses, linens, cookwares, indoor/outdoor seating, outdoor lighting & more.

Unique Extras: If we're able to raise enough, we would also love to add additional amenities to really push the guest experience at Endeavor to the next level. Some of those extras include outdoor bluetooth speakers, unique lounge swings, professional anti-mosquito treatments or even a climate controlled stargazing dome!

The more funds we raise, the more of these awesome amenities we can provide. Your support now will provide a more immersive experience at Endeavor when we open this June! 
 
If I Back Your Campaign, How Soon Can I Book My Stay?
Those who back our Indiegogo campaign with any package that includes advance booking in the description will receive an email within 48 hours asking which days they would like to schedule their stay. Dates will be on a first come, first serve basis so the sooner you back us, the more likely you are to get your ideal dates!
For those backers that contribute $75 or less, our Airbnb booking will open in May 2018 and your discount vouchers can be redeemed then! Make sure to subscribe to our newsletter for the most current information about the exact date our Airbnb booking page goes live. :)
 

 

 

Project Challenges
Though we already have most of the building blocks in place, there are always challenges with a project of this size. The biggest challenge we face is the timeline. Weather and temperature will play an important role in how soon the property development phase can be completed. That said, the amount of development needed is relatively small and should only take a matter of weeks to complete.
Our team is ready to get to work as soon as possible. As for the tiny home itself, it is currently being built off site and will be delivered to our property once completed (Mid-May 2018). Overall, we are extremely optimistic that we will meet our expected timeline to begin accepting guests in June of 2018.
 
Our Proud Partners!

 


 
Get Involved!
Love this idea, but can't back us? No problem, your support alone means the world to us. Help us spread the word by following and sharing our social media accounts or just telling your friends about Endeavor.
Here are some great ways to get involved.

Like us on Facebook at Follow us on Instagram @Endeavor_TinyHomes
Subscribe to our newsletter at EndeavorTinyHomes.com
Share this Indiegogo campaign on your social media
Tell a friend who would love to spend a weekend in our beautiful tiny home
Shop our unique, north shore themed merch at EndeavorTinyHomes.com
Email us and say hi, we would love to hear from you!

 
 Thank You!Thank you so much for taking the time to learn about our project. Your support is truly appreciated!Learn more at EndeavorTinyHomes.com

story:
The Purpose

The purpose of this campaign is to raise some fun. This is not a campaign to raise money for a much needed cause, the next can't live without invention or album that will hit the top charts. There isn't a return on investment on this campaign or promised prizes for those that contribute. I am honestly not expecting many to take part but I thought it might be fun and maybe if a bunch of people contributed $10.00 I would be on my way to getting her done. When I was about 16 years old had the opportunity to work on two project cars for our auto shop class. That experience introduced me to the world of classic cars. Two things I didn't have back then were money and patience. You really need both when working on classic cars. Fast forward almost 20 years and I find myself getting a 1954 Chevy 3100 Pick-up Truck. The amazing thing is that the truck was a gift from an old friend. I was blown away by the generosity of this friend and was excited for the possibility of having a classic car once again. This time around I had one of the two things needed when working on classic cars, patience. The truck needed a new engine so it sat for about two 1/2 years before I was able to give it any attention. My wife even tried getting it on this show where they steal your classic car and finish it in 7 days. Well they told her to send in all the information and then the show went off the air. The truck so far has had a new engine and transmission put in. I was also able to get an old front and rear end from a 70’s Camaro which has been installed under the truck. To get to this place has been a little over 4 years. There is finally some light at the end of the tunnel! However, I am fully aware that this is a toy and as the Bible says, something that moth and rust can destroy. It is something to have fun in and maybe take to show and have the opportunity to meet some new people and maybe be able to share Jesus with them. 

 

what's left


·                So far a new engine and transmission have been put in. Replaced front and rearend   With camaro front end and rearend. Also, installed air bags so it can be lowered and raised. Currently waiting for next steps. 

                                                                             

  • Next will be some minor fabrications that are needed. Relocating gas tank, installing rear shocks, new door latches and hardware and new wood for bed of truck.

 

  • Body and Paint will follow. Looking at going satin black with red smoothie wheels with chrome bullet caps

 

  • The finishing touch will be interior. Possibly going all black with some read trim on the bench seat and door panels.

story:
Short Summary

My name is not important, but Alberto's story is. He's a 15 years old boy who suffers severe Autism., lives with mom in a country where treatment is only available, and almost impossible to afford or reach overseas without help. 

With your help, a door might be opened for other children like Alberto as well. Maybe his government will read his story and more can be helped. They only depend on the outside world to help them get treatment, or train local doctors and therapists to assist them. 

If his mom can raise $7,800 , she will be able to provide a whole year treatment to Alberto. The money will pay for medical care and therapies. Just imagine, having a child and being trap in a country where there isn't treatment ; you can't afford the one that existed overseas and time runs out. How would you feel?  what would you do? what crazy thoughts will cross your mind? 

Lend your hand to Alberto and join his cause ....

What We Need 

The money will pay:

  • Dr. Neubrander's 6 online/skype visits and one year methyl-B12 treatment - for more info read here (http://www.drneubrander.com/)
  • Play therapy for 6 months / online consultations and players (http://autplaytherapy.com/about-autplay/)
  • Indiegogo campaign fee covered

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Alberto will become a few of the financially challenged Ecuadorian children with Autism to be under appropriate care. He is part of a pilot it is intended to help more and more children receiving virtual Dr's visits and play therapy under parent's supervision.  Dario Avila another Ecuadorian child who is the pioneer in this journey  and is my inspiration, is already receiving Autism care funded by friends and family. If we can proof this works, their government might be willing to create more funding sources for these children who are waiting for a miracle. Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much.
  • If you would like to learn more about the families you can arrange a Skype visit or email Dr. Neubrander about the Ecuadorian boys under this pilot, please visit my website and use the contact form,  or Dr. Neubrander who has already been contacted to treat Alberto. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn't mean you can’t help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Any suggestions are welcomed, just contact me at believekenia@gmail.com
  • If you would like to know more about who I am and my advocacy efforts you can visit my website and visit the "advocacy" tab at http://www.believekenia.com

- I am a life coach and as perks I am offering a free 60 minutes exploratory session for contributions over 200. 

- If you would like to donate perks, use my website contact form for arrangements. 

- If you would like to help in this and join my team and advocate for this children please feel free to contact me using my website contact form as well.

story:
Name a chicken in honor of someone, or something you love.  For $25 you will give a child a gift that will keep on giving.  Sponsor as many chickens as you like and get a photo with your chicken name and the child responsible for the chicken.  

When the campaign has ended I will e-mail you asking for your final decision on the chicken name.  Until then......

Much love!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Chris and I reside in Greece.I have a degree in chemistry and recently I have started a university course in computer science.I have discovered a hidden passion I had for mathematics at a quite late age and I have managed to "exploit" it by earning money through secure and profitable investments.

How?By wagering on soccer games.Most people bet on results based on their feeling or knowledge of the teams.I am based on statistics and probability theory but mainly on my mathematical calculations that seem to be correct in more than 92% of the bets.

I have found some clients on fiverr.com to follow my bets and I am so confident about what I choose to bet that I am willing to return the stake to the clients if I fail.It is possible for you to check at 

http://www.fiverr.com/lasombra/give-you-back-at-least-10-dollars-in-2-days

I am looking for contributors in order to make this a formal business.There are no real sports brokers and this is a great advantage to be the first one in the market.Contributing to this project is exactly like buying shares of an enterprise before it is officially launched.You are going to have:

  • your share of any profitable bet I put 
  • your opinion counted according to the amount you have contributed to 
  • a passive income once or twice a week(depending on the amount you have contributed with)
  • access to all books and ebooks at a lower price(depending on the amount you have contributed with) 

It is an unprecedented project that will definitely make an impact on the market.I will try to keep the tones low though until it is going to run at full speed.There are more ideas to improve it and multiply the earnigs drastically but I want keep a slow and steady pace in the beginning to prove to you that it can surely work.

What I Need

To launch the project and run it successfully for at least 12 months,I require 5000EUR.Analytically:

  • 1500EUR are required to legally and officially establish such a company in Greece 
  • 500EUR are required to create and support an online site for a year 
  • 1200EUR are required to buy the proper equipment 
  • 1500EUR are required as initial capital and backup(to secure the clients' investments in some cases of loss) 
  • 300EUR are required to properly advertise and promote the enterprise 
In case that the project becomes underfunded,then I will start it unofficially(as I am already doing) with all of you as contributors receiving their share according to their contribution.When the amount of 5000EUR is reached,then I will officially start it.

In case that the project becomes overfunded,then I will secure the extra money.In this case I will ask for your opinion concerning the possible options.

The Impact

I will offer: 

  • a small variety of products concerning soccer betting and I will show exactly how conscience and science can produce a leathal combination against The House.The House always win but let us be the ones not to lose 
  • books and ebooks about mathematics and profitable betting explaining the vital information one should know in order to bet safely and profitably.Contributors will have access to them at a better price 
  • on and off line seminars and classes on all fields of mathematics to demonstrate the power of this magnificent creation of the human mind.Contributors will have access to them at a better price 
  • jobs 
  • earnings 
Contributors will have full and detailed information about my movements in order to establish the company as well as the bets I choose.I want to create a business based on mutual trust thus I would ask you to be patient in order to see results.You can cross check and verify the validity of my sayings by asking people whom I have cooperated with at the above site.

Other Ways You Can Help

The amount to contribute is very low.However,if you are not able to afford it,then you can just spread the word about this outstanding project.If you can find contributors,then contact me in advance and I will compensate you for your efforts after the 60-day period.

story:
BRAIN EXERCISE WORKS TO ENHANCE PERFORMANCE. YOU CAN ALSO TRACK YOUR PROGRESS.


Concept headband 



               

        

Gold Mind Brain Gym™ continuously monitors brain activity and gives you real-time feedback on your smartphone or tablet.  Increasing demand for activity allows you to exercise your brain and experience results driven by software that allows you to "fly" over the Grand Canyon, play movies and video games and track your progress in the process. Simply slip the headband on, increase your brain activity, and earn “Master Mind” badges on your device.

Gold Mind Brain Gym™ is a headband with a self-activating HEG biosensor and an app.  Now you can activate and exercise your brain and empower yourself in harmony with the rhythm of your unique flow.



                            How does Gold Mind Brain Gym™ Work?

Unlike brain exercise apps and online brain games that claim to improve cognitive function generally, only Gold Mind Brain Gym™ allows training at specific brain regions along your prefrontal cortex - right where you need it for improved executive function, impulse control, focus and attention.  Patented innovation combines information from three sensors with an advanced algorithm. When you exercise your brain, it grows just like any muscle in your body.  With a fit brain you can focus and pay attention, rely on your memory, speed your processing, improve flexibility and solve your problems.

                     


THE SCIENCE IS IN; BRAIN EXERCISE IMPROVES FOCUS, ATTENTION, CONCENTRATION, PROCESSING SPEED AND THE ABILITY TO SELF-REGULATE YOUR BRAIN.


  



HEG BIOSENSOR TECHNOLOGY PICKS UP CHANGES IN THE COLOR OF YOUR BLOOD;  AS YOU USE YOUR BRAIN IT GETS REDDER BECAUSE OF THE CHANGE IN OXYGENATION. WATCH THIS SHORT VIDEO FOR A VIVID  DEMONSTRATION. THE TRACKING LIGHT SENSOR "SEES" THROUGH TRANSLUCENT THUMB [ & SKULL] BONE.



BIOFEEDBACK ENGINEERING 




           

 

History & Technology

Dr. Hershel Toomim (doctor of science; Sc.D.) originally discovered hemoencephalography (HEG for short) brain blood flow neurofeedback.  Dr. Toomim was chief scientist at Biocomp Research Institute in Los Angeles from 1969 until  2011.  He was an early pioneer in the field of psychophysiology, a neuroscientist and electrical engineer.  Dr. Toomim co-founded several seminal professional biofeedback organizations to promote the advancement of biofeedback research, development and clinical application.

Dr. Toomim was enamored with the concept of voluntary control of body processes not usually under conscious control.  He discovered voluntary control of brain blood flow and filed a patent for all radiation coming from the head used for biofeedback.  Since inception, HEG has been used as a research tool to study prefrontal cortex activation and brain blood flow.  For more on testing and validation click here.

Currently, the self-activating HEG biosensor is designed only for medical use at a price only a doctor can pay.  Our mission is to develop the Gold Mind Brain Gym™ headband at a price that you can pay.  

The Gold Mind Brain Gym™ parent organization, Biofeedback institute of Los Angeles,  is a seminal establishment for the advancement of biofeedback.  The founders, Drs. Hershel and Marjorie Toomim, were innovators in the field of psychophysiology.  In 1973, the Biofeedback Institute of Los Angeles established a 501(c) nonprofit organization to provide biofeedback, psychotherapeutic, educational and consulting services to the community; to train professionals in the use of clinical biofeedback as an adjunct for the treatment of stress-related disorders and stress management; and to serve everyone including those who can not afford private practice fees.

Our plan at Gold Mind Brain Gym™ is to advance Dr. Hershel and Marjorie Toomims' vision to provide reliable and affordable wellness with the use of biosensors and feedback training tools and techniques for consumers.

Brain Exercise Works

Gold Mind Brain Gym™ is an innovative approach to entertainment-based education and support for individual brain health.  It will provide software applications for cognitive function enhancement using a fashionable and powerful, end-user headband that incorporates near infrared light technology.

Gold Mind Brain Gym™ makes brain exercise accessible;  Brain challenge is now possible with a scientifically designed biosensor.  As the brain mitigates memory, attention, focus, speed, flexibility, and all of your executive "higher" thinking,  brain exercise potentiates your brain's performance and improves your ability to solve everyday problems, making life easier. The Gold Mind Brain Gym™ app will allow you to create an individualized training program, personalized to your current brain signature.  You'll  get continuous information about your moment-to-moment cognitive skill as well as your overall progress. 

Many agencies suggest that brain exercise is an ideal intervention for active disease prevention.  The latest neuropsychological research (BHMR www.sharpbrains.com/market-report) shows that Alzheimer's disease symptoms may be delayed and possibly prevented by the construction of a cognitive reserve developed through brain exercise.  

Bio [sensor] feedback helps people improve brain function and optimize performance by continuously displaying real-time signals perceived by the user. This process of unique and personal feedback leads to an increased awareness of feelings and sensations.  This awareness facilitates a person's ability to control and process the information that is fed back.


                 



HEG biosensors are non-invasive and painless.  Biosensors do not put anything into to the trainee.  Rather, the data from biosensors act as a mirror, This information combined with immersive software, ideally motivates an increase in physiological activity that naturally exercise your brain.

Acquired brain exercise skills help you form new habits using classical conditioning.  Laboratory results validate improvement in mental performance. Bio [sensor] feedback is one of the few training methods endorsed the the established medical community.



 Measurable Results


Team

Partner:  For over 40 years, Biocomp Research Institute has specialized in the research, development and distribution of electronic and psychophysiological instrumentation for a worldwide market.  Biocomp Research Institute drives the leading edge of the HEG brain activation market with , by far, the most unique and efficient sensor available.

                

“We are proud to be a part of the Gold Mind Brain Gym & Spa™ team and the launch of a new headband with HEG technology - an innovation that will have far reaching effects on the digital brain health market.”  - Bob Marsh,  President of Biocomp Research Institute.

Advisory Council:  Gold Mind Brain Gym & Spa™ pioneers offer unique expertise - from psychology to software engineering with biometrix design. Our team includes multigenerational perspectives from youth to young adult to seasoned professional advisors.  Our purpose is to support alternative health care options.  We are here to motivate and support our user's peak performance goals.  We are interested in promoting novel products and engaging service platforms to monitor and evaluate systems associated with neurocognitive functioning.  We come together to develop, digital brain tools for empowerment, wellness and resilience in harmony with life and for future generations.  

Why Indiegogo?

One of the greatest public health challenges confronting our world is a brain disease epidemic. According to the Digital Brain Health Market Report, published by Sharp Brains 2013 ( www.sharpbrains.com/market-report), “2 billion people worldwide suffer from brain-based health and productivity challenges.  In 2015, the resulting global economic burden is estimated at over 2 trillion dollars.  Public Health initiatives aim to achieve lasting public health and wellness changes, specifically the promotion of improved and better regulated cognitive function.  Healthy aging programs promote “a nation in which the public embraces cognitive health as a vital component of health.”  The Public Health Road Map for State and National Partnerships, 2013 through 2018, lays out a spectrum of broad actions designed to promote brain functioning.  The US Government Healthy Brain Initiative Action items include the need to monitor and evaluate, educate and empower…”

                      

According to Brain Health Market Report, people want self-administered, non-invasive, preventive options and more wellness and fitness than medicine. The survey of over 3,000 early adopters and decision makers found these interesting statistics:

73% agree that digital technologies can significantly complement other behavioral and drug-based interventions,

94% agree that addressing brain health should be a wellness priority,

83% agree that adults should take charge of their own brain fitness without waiting for a doctor to tell them,

With Indiegogo global networks, we intend to spread the message about the availability of affordable brain health tools that people are asking for.

We've set a goal of $250,000.00, which will allow us to integrate (wireless) bluetooth technology into the existing HEG biosensor headband and integrate the encoder.  Every dollar raised through Indiegogo will go directly to headband redesign and toward the development of immersive software for your smartphone or tablet.  We can begin our first large scale manufacturing and make Gold Mind Brain Gym™ available as soon as December 2014.

Future Plans

Imagine playing your favorite video games hands free. Imagine exercising your brain and measurably improving your memory, attention, concentration and focus.  Gold Mind Brain Gym™ brings your imagination to life. 

At our Los Angeles laboratory we are continuing to develop and refine our “Spa” parameters and technology to include a wider range of wellness biosensors and applications.

We are continuing to collect data about brain training efficiency and training algorithms.  We are working closely with engineers to provide the most reliable and efficient HEG microprocessors.  Continuing work focuses on software development for immersive and entertaining training experiences. We are integrating personalized avatars with algorithms for learning.

Our market research activities are aimed at developing unique distribution avenues for underserved local communities.  For example, our business plan includes developing a mobile brain gym to help close the gap between those who would like digital brain health tools and the distance needed to travel to get them.  Developing unique products for seniors, children and athletes is a high priority target for us. 

Delivery, Refunds & Contact

Gold Mind Brain Gym & Spa™ is working in earnest to ensure that all Perks are delivered to Indiegogo backers on time.  Our best efforts, however, are not guaranteed.  We are committed to ensuring the satisfaction of those who have supported our campaign.  

If you are requesting a refund, please forward your information and the reason that you are making the request.  We value your feedback. Brain exercise is one of our favorite subjects.  Let’s connect: GoldMind@goldmindbraingym.com  

If you are in or around the Los Angeles area and would like to sample HEG brain exercise, please contact our office to make an appointment: www.biocompresearch.org or doctordupont@gmail.com

FAQ

Q.  Is biofeedback a medical procedure?

A.  No, and you don't need a prescription to use biofeedback, HEG neurofeedback or biosensors.

Q.  Do you have any evidence that Gold Mind Brain Gym works?

A.  Please read original research at biocompresearch.org/biocomp-hershel

Q. How to you activate your Brain with Gold Mind Brain Gym™

A.  Biofeedback and neurofeedback for the brain requires intention, which is nothing more than exercising voluntary control or willpower  - You don’t think about it, you just want it to happen, much like you want to read this sentence right now.


Postmodern: “A general and wide-ranging term, largely a reaction to the assumed certainty of scientific...  Reality is constructed as the mind tries to understand its own particular and personal reality. Interpretation is everything; reality...is what the world means to us individually. Postmodernism relies on concrete experience over abstract principles…rather than certain and universal…"post"  because it denies the existence of ultimate principles and of the so-called "modern" mind”, from  www.pbs.org/.../gengloss/postm-body.html‎   

Your New Brain Fitness Partner 

Gold Mind Brain Gym™



                                         

                                                      T-shirt Perk
story_txt:
BRAIN EXERCISE WORKS TO ENHANCE PERFORMANCE. YOU CAN ALSO TRACK YOUR PROGRESS.Concept headband                        Gold Mind Brain Gym™ continuously monitors brain activity and gives you real-time feedback on your smartphone or tablet.  Increasing demand for activity allows you to exercise your brain and experience results driven by software that allows you to "fly" over the Grand Canyon, play movies and video games and track your progress in the process. Simply slip the headband on, increase your brain activity, and earn “Master Mind” badges on your device.Gold Mind Brain Gym™ is a headband with a self-activating HEG biosensor and an app.  Now you can activate and exercise your brain and empower yourself in harmony with the rhythm of your unique flow.                            How does Gold Mind Brain Gym™ Work?Unlike brain exercise apps and online brain games that claim to improve cognitive function generally, only Gold Mind Brain Gym™ allows training at specific brain regions along your prefrontal cortex - right where you need it for improved executive function, impulse control, focus and attention.  Patented innovation combines information from three sensors with an advanced algorithm. When you exercise your brain, it grows just like any muscle in your body.  With a fit brain you can focus and pay attention, rely on your memory, speed your processing, improve flexibility and solve your problems.                     THE SCIENCE IS IN; BRAIN EXERCISE IMPROVES FOCUS, ATTENTION, CONCENTRATION, PROCESSING SPEED AND THE ABILITY TO SELF-REGULATE YOUR BRAIN.  HEG BIOSENSOR TECHNOLOGY PICKS UP CHANGES IN THE COLOR OF YOUR BLOOD;  AS YOU USE YOUR BRAIN IT GETS REDDER BECAUSE OF THE CHANGE IN OXYGENATION. WATCH THIS SHORT VIDEO FOR A VIVID  DEMONSTRATION. THE TRACKING LIGHT SENSOR "SEES" THROUGH TRANSLUCENT THUMB [ & SKULL] BONE.BIOFEEDBACK ENGINEERING             History & TechnologyDr. Hershel Toomim (doctor of science; Sc.D.) originally discovered hemoencephalography (HEG for short) brain blood flow neurofeedback.  Dr. Toomim was chief scientist at Biocomp Research Institute in Los Angeles from 1969 until  2011.  He was an early pioneer in the field of psychophysiology, a neuroscientist and electrical engineer.  Dr. Toomim co-founded several seminal professional biofeedback organizations to promote the advancement of biofeedback research, development and clinical application.Dr. Toomim was enamored with the concept of voluntary control of body processes not usually under conscious control.  He discovered voluntary control of brain blood flow and filed a patent for all radiation coming from the head used for biofeedback.  Since inception, HEG has been used as a research tool to study prefrontal cortex activation and brain blood flow.  For more on testing and validation click here.Currently, the self-activating HEG biosensor is designed only for medical use at a price only a doctor can pay.  Our mission is to develop the Gold Mind Brain Gym™ headband at a price that you can pay.  The Gold Mind Brain Gym™ parent organization, Biofeedback institute of Los Angeles,  is a seminal establishment for the advancement of biofeedback.  The founders, Drs. Hershel and Marjorie Toomim, were innovators in the field of psychophysiology.  In 1973, the Biofeedback Institute of Los Angeles established a 501(c) nonprofit organization to provide biofeedback, psychotherapeutic, educational and consulting services to the community; to train professionals in the use of clinical biofeedback as an adjunct for the treatment of stress-related disorders and stress management; and to serve everyone including those who can not afford private practice fees.Our plan at Gold Mind Brain Gym™ is to advance Dr. Hershel and Marjorie Toomims' vision to provide reliable and affordable wellness with the use of biosensors and feedback training tools and techniques for consumers.Brain Exercise WorksGold Mind Brain Gym™ is an innovative approach to entertainment-based education and support for individual brain health.  It will provide software applications for cognitive function enhancement using a fashionable and powerful, end-user headband that incorporates near infrared light technology.Gold Mind Brain Gym™ makes brain exercise accessible;  Brain challenge is now possible with a scientifically designed biosensor.  As the brain mitigates memory, attention, focus, speed, flexibility, and all of your executive "higher" thinking,  brain exercise potentiates your brain's performance and improves your ability to solve everyday problems, making life easier. The Gold Mind Brain Gym™ app will allow you to create an individualized training program, personalized to your current brain signature.  You'll  get continuous information about your moment-to-moment cognitive skill as well as your overall progress. Many agencies suggest that brain exercise is an ideal intervention for active disease prevention.  The latest neuropsychological research (BHMR www.sharpbrains.com/market-report) shows that Alzheimer's disease symptoms may be delayed and possibly prevented by the construction of a cognitive reserve developed through brain exercise.  Bio [sensor] feedback helps people improve brain function and optimize performance by continuously displaying real-time signals perceived by the user. This process of unique and personal feedback leads to an increased awareness of feelings and sensations.  This awareness facilitates a person's ability to control and process the information that is fed back.                 HEG biosensors are non-invasive and painless.  Biosensors do not put anything into to the trainee.  Rather, the data from biosensors act as a mirror, This information combined with immersive software, ideally motivates an increase in physiological activity that naturally exercise your brain.Acquired brain exercise skills help you form new habits using classical conditioning.  Laboratory results validate improvement in mental performance. Bio [sensor] feedback is one of the few training methods endorsed the the established medical community. Measurable ResultsTeamPartner:  For over 40 years, Biocomp Research Institute has specialized in the research, development and distribution of electronic and psychophysiological instrumentation for a worldwide market.  Biocomp Research Institute drives the leading edge of the HEG brain activation market with , by far, the most unique and efficient sensor available.                “We are proud to be a part of the Gold Mind Brain Gym & Spa™ team and the launch of a new headband with HEG technology - an innovation that will have far reaching effects on the digital brain health market.”  - Bob Marsh,  President of Biocomp Research Institute.Advisory Council:  Gold Mind Brain Gym & Spa™ pioneers offer unique expertise - from psychology to software engineering with biometrix design. Our team includes multigenerational perspectives from youth to young adult to seasoned professional advisors.  Our purpose is to support alternative health care options.  We are here to motivate and support our user's peak performance goals.  We are interested in promoting novel products and engaging service platforms to monitor and evaluate systems associated with neurocognitive functioning.  We come together to develop, digital brain tools for empowerment, wellness and resilience in harmony with life and for future generations.  Why Indiegogo?One of the greatest public health challenges confronting our world is a brain disease epidemic. According to the Digital Brain Health Market Report, published by Sharp Brains 2013 ( www.sharpbrains.com/market-report), “2 billion people worldwide suffer from brain-based health and productivity challenges.  In 2015, the resulting global economic burden is estimated at over 2 trillion dollars.  Public Health initiatives aim to achieve lasting public health and wellness changes, specifically the promotion of improved and better regulated cognitive function.  Healthy aging programs promote “a nation in which the public embraces cognitive health as a vital component of health.”  The Public Health Road Map for State and National Partnerships, 2013 through 2018, lays out a spectrum of broad actions designed to promote brain functioning.  The US Government Healthy Brain Initiative Action items include the need to monitor and evaluate, educate and empower…”                       According to Brain Health Market Report, people want self-administered, non-invasive, preventive options and more wellness and fitness than medicine. The survey of over 3,000 early adopters and decision makers found these interesting statistics: 73% agree that digital technologies can significantly complement other behavioral and drug-based interventions,94% agree that addressing brain health should be a wellness priority,83% agree that adults should take charge of their own brain fitness without waiting for a doctor to tell them,With Indiegogo global networks, we intend to spread the message about the availability of affordable brain health tools that people are asking for.We've set a goal of $250,000.00, which will allow us to integrate (wireless) bluetooth technology into the existing HEG biosensor headband and integrate the encoder.  Every dollar raised through Indiegogo will go directly to headband redesign and toward the development of immersive software for your smartphone or tablet.  We can begin our first large scale manufacturing and make Gold Mind Brain Gym™ available as soon as December 2014.Future Plans Imagine playing your favorite video games hands free. story:
Our website: sarajunebk.com 

Not so long ago, two bright-eyed young women left their native land of Utah and arrived in Brooklyn, NY. The decision was easy--something was pulling them here. Three and a half years later they are opening a small salon, Sara June, in the heart of the best little borough around.



Sara Gilmore is the owner, expert stylist and creative mind of Sara June. After 14 years in the hair industry, she is excited to be putting her energy into something that she can call her own, where she can continue to surround herself with the amazing women who have become her clients and friends.  

LeAnna Bingham is the salon manager and master of organization. She will also be passionately overseeing the health, wellness and community aspect of the salon. We are excited to offer our clients more than just great hair. 

We are in the final months of pulling this adorable space together. So, we could use a little love... in the form of money. ;) This is where you, our community, friends and fans come in!

You'll see our perks and donation amounts to the right. Everything helps! Our goal is to raise 8.5k, but of course any funds we raise will be greatly appreciated and used wisely. Your contributions will be put toward the final touches of the interior and exterior of this great little space.



The progress is exciting!  We will keep you updated as it moves along.

*A little note about the name Sara June. June is not Sara's middle name. Her granddad, Chester June Gilmore, affectionately called her "Sara June" as a child. The nickname stuck, and Sara is proud to use his name as the name of her business. Granddad Chet is 60 years older (and wiser) than Sara, making him 91 this year. He's still kickin' around his garden in St. Joseph, Missouri while Grandma kindly yells what veggies she wants from the kitchen window. 

Acknowledgments: A special shout out to our greatly talented friend, Holli Zollinger for the design of our beautiful logo (hollizollinger.com). And a HUGE thank you goes to Larendee and her team at Roos Consulting (roosconsulting.com) for making sure we don't lose our minds and for keeping us focused on living up to our full potential. This project has taught us that our resources are limitless and that all things are possible when surrounded by the right people, which we definitely are!

story:
Liberty Lovers, Friends,

My name is Carl Bradley.
Most of you know me through my work on our various Liberty pages on social media, mainly Restoring the Republic on Facebook. Well, I have a funny though unfortunate story to share.

Yesterday, March 1st, 2014, I was minding my own business driving to the pharmacy for my heart medication, then off to my sister's to visit with her dog as my sister worked her typical 12 hour Saturday shift at the hospital.
On my way through my hometown of Ocean City, NJ, I was pulled over by a cop. This is the 4th time in the last 12 months I have been pulled over in my home town of a mere 11,000 residents stretching a whopping 8 miles on our little island. (Prior 3 resulted in no tickets, because I was doing NOTHING wrong.) This time was not so innocuous.

The officer came to my window and as he asked for my papers I asked why he pulled me over. His response was that my registration was expired. I immediately disagreed and asked why he thought so. He said he ran my tags and the computer shows it as expired. (At this point I will confirm it WAS, in fact, expired. Last winter I went through plenty of personal turmoil, lo-lighted by losing my car amidst some $30-40,000 in damages to 'Super Storm Sandy', followed a month later by the loss of my mother to cancer. My prior car registration ran through May 1st each year, but I ended up taking possession of Mom's car after the new year and apparently officially registered it at the end of January. Thus my confusion.)
When I gave him my papers and he confirmed my mistake, I asked why he ran my tags. He said "Because I can." He then went to his cruiser and wrote me a ticket for the expired registration. Upon his return, as he was handing me the ticket, I again asked why he ran my tags, and what I had done wrong to cause any suspicion. He answered that he didn't need a suspicion and just ran the tags because I was in front of him.
I asked him if he was aware of the protections of the 4th Amendment at which time he told me I had a bad attitude and if I didn't 'fix it' he was going to impound my car. I said "So you are now going to antagonize and intimidate me with the threat of towing on top of the ticket?" His response was "That's it, I'm towing your car." and he walked away.
Before the two truck arrived, he OF COURSE, had a back up officer roll up. When that officer approached me I ask by what authority the first pulled me over and by what authority were they now taking my property. His response was priceless! ...
He said "The 5th Amendment gives us the authority."!!! I know, I know! I laughed right in his face!
After explaining the 5th Amendment's ACTUAL meaning and how they were infringing on my 5th A protected right by improper seizure of personal property, I also explained the 4th A and my right to privacy making the running of tags improper, then explained the purpose of the Bill of Rights was to protect ME from THEM and gave them NO authority to do ANYTHING. Then for good measure I cited the Supremacy Clause as rebuttal to their failed effort to argue they had some statutory right to usurp my 4th and 5th A Rights. After they conferred and realized they were outgunned , they told me to stop arguing because "We can go 'round and 'round here on the side of the road and never get any answers." To wit I offered to get my pocket copy of THE CONSTITUTION out of my briefcase. They declined and proceeded to steal, er eh, I'm sorry, "impound" my personal property.
I write this to share this experience so others see how deeply screwed up our dear Republic has become and to ask for help.
I have spent the better part of the last three years developing my own business for marketing nightlife and while it is slowly getting closer to a profitable launch, it does not currently generate any revenue. Though I have very recently dived into another opportunity to create income, I am still barely living hand to mouth at this point.
When I total up the ticket, towing fee, impound lot charge and daily storage charges, I face a financial burden I simply cannot take on at this point in time. I honestly do not have exact totals yet because it is the weekend, but I wanted to get this story out and start this campaign asap as every day counts!
My target goal to raise is just $600.00. My hope is that I can beg or borrow enough from family to get my car out by week's end so storage charges do not become completely untenable, but family is no better off than I am so I will NEED to repay them quickly.
I ask that you donate even a few bucks to my cause because I really need the help, but perhaps more importantly, I ask that you SHARE this campaign where ever you interact with Liberty Seekers. Obviously further exposure of the campaign will increase my chances of raising the funds, but it will also spread the word of the continuing usurpation of our Rights. This is a cause that absolutely MUST be brought ever further into the view of the masses.
Please donate what you can and share this everywhere. IndieGoGo has some great SHARE tools for you as well!
Lastly, please note that beyond my deepest grateful thanks, I am tossing in some fun Liberty-esque Perks if you are able to help at a couple specific levels.

Gratefully in liberty,

Carl D Bradley

story:
Short Summary

 

Hello! My name is Felisha. I'm a young registered nurse living in sunny South Florida! 

Arianne's Senior Social Club is an adult daycare inspired by Arianne, herself! (Also known as my grandmother). This business was initiated to reduce the lack of socialization, and increase the longevity of life of our elderly people. Here in the northern parts of South Florida, we have a slew of older, retired adults who, unfortunately, do not have much to occupy their time. Our family who have worked so hard during their lifetime to care for us are now home alone or awaiting their loved ones to return home from their day. During this time alone, there's an increase of depression, anxiety, the risk of falls, other injuries, and sometimes even death with out the proper care and supervision. Arianne's Senior Social Club is devised to decrease these risk factors by creating a space to be active and content throughout the day. While we go to work, school, and complete other tasks, our loved ones are in a safe environment providing conversations, games, activities, exercise, nutrition, transportation, and medical supervision. Our staff is equipped with healthcare professionals who have the skill and knowledge to both supervise and interact with all of our participants throughout the day. Not only does this benefit our loved ones, but it also gives the caregiver a chance to take a small break, so that they're able to love and care for their family adequately. Supporting this campaign will launch this business and ensure that our families who worked so hard during their time to take care of us are taken care of just the same, if not better!

 

What We Need 

  • Currently, we are in need of $20,000. This funding will cover the building to hold our participants, as well as furniture, decor, and the respective amenities to be able to provide to the fullest capacity. 
  • When fully funded, we can begin to work on our next project.. A POOL! A handicap and wheelchair accessible pool will open up the opportunity for water aerobics as a form of exercise in our facility. 
  • If we do not reach our goal, the funds will mainly go towards funding the building as a foundation for our plans.

The Impact

Arianne's Senior Social Club aims to provide a sense of togetherness and love within the elderly community. Our facility provides an outlet where seniors can interact with their peers and like-minded individuals all while improving their well-being. Our top three assets that differentiates us from other adult daycares are companionship, promoting healthy living, and our very own Benefits Assistance Program. These include, interactive activities, proper diets, exercise, mental health, computer literacy, and so much more.  The Benefits Assistance Program aids our seniors who may need help with eligibility and the application processes of things such as Medicare, Medicaid, SNAPS, citizenship, etc. Arianne's Senior Social Club is curated to bring fun, creativity, life longevity, new experiences, and education for our loved ones. 

Risks & Challenges

I have been a nurse for over six years. The bulk of my career has been in a long-term care facility. Therefore, I have a lot of experience with this particular population. The elderly, those suffering from dementia, Alzheimer's disease, and decreased mobility are no things new to me and our staff. The biggest risk is that this is my first time opening and managing a facility on my own. However, I'm taking this risk full on with positive and faith-filled mindset. Knowing that this plan has been placed on my heart by the Lord Himself and it's my duty to fulfill it with hard-work, dedication, and keeping Him first! 

Other Ways You Can Help

SHARE! SHARE! SHARE!!
story_txt:
Short Summary
 
Hello! My name is Felisha. I'm a young registered nurse living in sunny South Florida! 
Arianne's Senior Social Club is an adult daycare inspired by Arianne, herself! (Also known as my grandmother). This business was initiated to reduce the lack of socialization, and increase the longevity of life of our elderly people. Here in the northern parts of South Florida, we have a slew of older, retired adults who, unfortunately, do not have much to occupy their time. Our family who have worked so hard during their lifetime to care for us are now home alone or awaiting their loved ones to return home from their day. During this time alone, there's an increase of depression, anxiety, the risk of falls, other injuries, and sometimes even death with out the proper care and supervision. Arianne's Senior Social Club is devised to decrease these risk factors by creating a space to be active and content throughout the day. While we go to work, school, and complete other tasks, our loved ones are in a safe environment providing conversations, games, activities, exercise, nutrition, transportation, and medical supervision. Our staff is equipped with healthcare professionals who have the skill and knowledge to both supervise and interact with all of our participants throughout the day. Not only does this benefit our loved ones, but it also gives the caregiver a chance to take a small break, so that they're able to love and care for their family adequately. Supporting this campaign will launch this business and ensure that our families who worked so hard during their time to take care of us are taken care of just the same, if not better!
 

What We Need 

Currently, we are in need of $20,000. This funding will cover the building to hold our participants, as well as furniture, decor, and the respective amenities to be able to provide to the fullest capacity. 
When fully funded, we can begin to work on our next project.. A POOL! A handicap and wheelchair accessible pool will open up the opportunity for water aerobics as a form of exercise in our facility. 
If we do not reach our goal, the funds will mainly go towards funding the building as a foundation for our plans.


The Impact
Arianne's Senior Social Club aims to provide a sense of togetherness and love within the elderly community. Our facility provides an outlet where seniors can interact with their peers and like-minded individuals all while improving their well-being. Our top three assets that differentiates us from other adult daycares are companionship, promoting healthy living, and our very own Benefits Assistance Program. These include, interactive activities, proper diets, exercise, mental health, computer literacy, and so much more.  The Benefits Assistance Program aids our seniors who may need help with eligibility and the application processes of things such as Medicare, Medicaid, SNAPS, citizenship, etc. Arianne's Senior Social Club is curated to bring fun, creativity, life longevity, new experiences, and education for our loved ones. 

Risks & Challenges
I have been a nurse for over six years. The bulk of my career has been in a long-term care facility. Therefore, I have a lot of experience with this particular population. The elderly, those suffering from dementia, Alzheimer's disease, and decreased mobility are no things new to me and our staff. The biggest risk is that this is my first time opening and managing a facility on my own. However, I'm taking this risk full on with positive and faith-filled mindset. Knowing that this plan has been placed on my heart by the Lord Himself and it's my duty to fulfill it with hard-work, dedication, and keeping Him first! 

Other Ways You Can Help
SHARE! SHARE! SHARE!!

story:
Short Summary

We are "Less Government. More Fun." (LGMF).                                                                               Our goal is educating and encouraging people to get involved in finding solutions to problems, rather than leaning on big government to solve our problems.

  • My name is Buddy Belk. I'm a 'less government' crusader and love this country 
  • Spreading the LGMF message will ultimately unite Americans. It's simple: you are either for less government and more fun. Or, you're not
  • Contributors will help to provide the resources needed to help spread our message to each of the 50 states.   


What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $25,000 in funding.

  • The funding will provide materials and perks for at least one college ambassador in each state. (Goal is to connect with multiple schools in each state)
  • Our message is distinctive, yet simple. The words (LGMF) strike passion in the heart of all who believe a smaller government is the right kind of government
  • If our goal is not met, the funding we do receive will be used to seek out LGMF ambassadors in as many states as the funds will allow


The Impact

When tens of thousands of Americans get behind a great idea, amazing things happen: The message spreads and passion takes over.

  • Energizing college students to become more self reliant instead of waiting for big government to solve problems will be critical for success
  • It's a major mind shift from what the media and millions of people say and believe today
  • College-aged Americans will evangelize the message through action and education at their schools and in their communities


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to provide financial support you can help in other ways:

  • Tell family and friends about LGMF and encourage them to make some noise 
  • Write down on paper: "Less Government. More Fun." and let us know what they mean to you via Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest or at lessgovmorefun.com
  • Utilize the complimentary Indiegogo tools to pass along our request  

Thank you for doing what you can. You will make the difference!
