on their purchases, the small businesses will be able to compete with the
bigger stores.
-  Each shop will appear not only in the commercial centre of his choice,
but also in ALL of the commercial centres in every single community.
-  Each shop has the possibility, through its profile, to advertise in any
commercial centre of his choice in an easy and economical way.
-  The shop will be able to enjoy the same benefits as its clients, because
by being a member, he too will gain discount vouchers and Happys thanks to his
extensive network.
-  The businesses that have their shop online already will be able to use
our BEHAPPY2 API with the client, who, from the external page, will be able to
pay for their purchase on BEHAPPY2 using the same payment methods and applying
the same discounts.
[API = Application Programming Interface.]
-  If a client pays through the BEHAPPY2 API, it means
that the business will not have to foot the bill for the additional charges associated
with other forms of payment methods (Visa, Paypal, etc.)
-  The business or shop will be receive his commission immediately after
the meal, collection or payment of the products or services sold. (**)
-  The business will always be paid in euro (or local currency) and never
in discount vouchers or Happys!
-  The business will not have to offer any discounts, nor will he notice
the discounts applied by the client with his vouchers and Happys in his
earnings.
-  For products that have to be sent by post, the business will be able to
take advantage of the competitive postage rates offered by BEHAPPY2.
(**) The business will receive 90% of the retail price, unless the
purchase has been made with Happys, in which case he will receive 100%, and
always in euros. The extra 10% is the usual commercial margin associated with
forming part of a cashback platform.
Communities:

-  A community that has been recognised by BEHAPPY2 will have its own
personalised online shopping centre.
-  Each community can bring new businesses or shops to it and receive a
commission for doing so.
-  For each purchase made in his commercial centre, the community will
receive a commission.
-  A community can fit his social network into his commercial centre and as
a result receive many discount vouchers and Happys.
-  The discount vouchers and Happys can be converted into euro (or local
currency).
-  Additional optimised visibility by his own partners-sponsors.
-  Each commercial centre will receive commission for the advertising and
publicity (views and clicks) that is made within his platform.
-  Through BEHAPPY2, for the first time, a community will be able to give
his sponsor the possibility to recuperate the money invested as a sponsor,
using the community commercial centre as an additional sales channel.
BEHAPPY2 is an online cashback platform that engulfs the whole
buying-selling process, and all its participating members. The client or
individual, the suppliers or small businesses and the community with its own
commercial centre of which they are all a part of. And these are communities
that move in different circles such as culture, sport, social themes, etc. but
who share the same common ideal with its members and distributors. 
Description of the funding:

The funding of the discount vouchers and Happys is completely covered
with the 10% of the commercial margin. The breakages of vouchers that have
expired or that haven’t been used will be wholly reinvested in order to promote
the growth of the social network.
But how does BEHAPPY2 generate its income?
a.  The shops and businesses will pay an annual fee of 100€ for which they
will receive a space in the online shop that we will maintain, the use of our
loyalty system and the app, and the API.
b.  The community as a whole will pay a unique fee of 500€ for registering
the commercial centre. We will take care of everything related to maintaining
the online space and all the administration concerned with calculating
commissions and discounts for all its members.
c.  The commercial centre will pay a monthly rate of 2.5% from all the
commissions gained, with a minimum of 25€.
d.  A percentage of the advertising (views and clicks) will go to the
respective community, while another percentage will go to BEHAPPY2.Description of our exclusive Perks (see also "Perks"):
E-Commerce Plot. Exclusive BEHAPPY2-product. You
will lease and have usufruct rights for 10 years on an E-Commerce Plot.
Just like a real plot of land, E-Commerce Plots
can be hired out, and in this way generate returns. But the E-Commerce have
only conveniences, unlike a real plot of land, for which you would have to pay
all kind of taxes. And we guarantee your plot will always have a tenant; you
won’t have to search one, neither be concerned whether he pays the rent.

story:
Short Summary

  • My wife and I married 10 years ago. We quickly started our family and have a 9 year old daughter, an 8 year old daughter, a 6 year old daughter and a 3 year old daughter.

  • We wanted to add one more bundle of joy to our family, and call it quits... little did we know, that my wife would conceive natural and spontaneous triplets!

  • We have now added one boy and Identical girls

  • We are so thankful that they are all healthy and strong. Pregnancy and delivery were an adventure all on their own, and we are now ready to start the adventure of raising 7 children (all under the age of 10) including our tiny Triplet baby’s! We thank you from the bottom of our heart for any monetary help you can provide.

What We Need & What You Get

  • With the unexpected news that TIPLETS are on the way, our family is now facing expenses times 3! Triple the diapers, wipes, clothes, bath supplies, cribs, bedding, swings, toys, ect

  • Hospital bills, Dr. appointments, check-ups, breast pumps, formula supplementation

  • Later in life expenses, family vehicle (van bus?), bicycles, school supplies, recreational sports, college, ect

  • EVERY Donation will go to help enrich and enhance these triplets lives and well being.

  • As detailed in the Perks to the side, donations will entitle you to a picture of the triplets as a keepsake and memento for the help you provided a young life. Please feel free to "Contribute Now" at the bottom of the page in any dollar amount you wish.

The Impact

  • Your support will make a world of difference to our growing family.

  • Every donation dollar will be spent to enrich and enhance the life of our triplets. Providing them greater opportunity and a more exciting life.

Other Ways You Can Help

There is a paypal account set up under: JensenTriplets@gmail.com if you would like to donate there.

Please help us spread the word on your facebook page, Twitter, and any other form of communication you can.

Also, If no monetary donation is available, please feel free to spread our story of 4 daughters, then natural triplets of 2 more girls and a boy. It has brought a smile to everyone’s face that we have told, or how have been shocked to meet us in person. I hope our story can bring a smile to your face, and others who hear our good news.

story:
Short Summary

I see, as most, the possibilites of a Time Bank, a Social Network and Freelancer Connection Portals. What I think is amazing, and for this i work and give all my time, is the combination of all this, making the Time Bank concept a concept not only for local communities or social ideas, but for business too.

Me, thats a 43 years Swiss Guy, living since 12 years in Brazil, mostly arround São Paulo. Worked as Freelancer to CTO in variuous Startups, had and have own IT and Consulting company. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

The concept of a Time Bank is obviously to have time (hours) as "currency".
What we are looking for is 20000$, to fincance the needed tools and some outsourced programming to bring the first version online. Most i do myself, but its a bigger project, which needs some basics.

Btw: We are not only looking for that money, but for, think in time banking, hour based investments, like designers, translators, programing. So you can be part of BancoH, without, or additionaly without money.

The Impact

A global time bank can really change life, opportunities and possibilities not only for the private users, but a lot of small and mid sized business and give new ways to come to resources (time or objects) for NGO's.
Have a look at our presentation and websites, to get a better idea please.

 

The Future We Are Creating

 

Begin to recognize the real value of Time. An hour has 60 minutes, independent on who you are and where you are in the world

 

How We Are Creating It

 

By using top of the line technology, we will incorporate the concepts of time banking and social/business networks into global and local communities. We will build a large network of participants, and give businesses and private citizens the option to sponsor social and ecologic organizations and projects by recognizing the value of time

 

Our Story & Why You Should Support Us

 

I have experience helping other financial and economic organizations launch, and believe that the idea of a Time Bank is something that can change the world. BancoH can provide a value to the community in new and long lasting ways.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are not only looking for that money, but for, think in time banking, hour based investments, like designers, translators, programing. So you can be part of BancoH, without, or additionaly without money.

story:
*** New goal: $10,000 ***

This effort has exceeded my wildest expectations in helping Drake open Cluck. After 24 hours we have reached over $3700 dollars from 80 donors to cover over 25% of the original zoning costs. It truly reflects the community excitement and commitment to seeing Cluck open on Broadway.

We have 29 days left in the campaign and I have had requests from community members to push the goal up to $10k. This new target will need at least another 140 new donors to meet. 

I am committed to trying to make this happen but meeting this goal will be tough after the initial wave of donations and excitment has passed.

It will be your help, promotion, and ideas that will get us over the line.

Thanks for working to build a better Providence!

----

Short Summary

Cluck is fighting to revitalize a blighted vacant building into a tax paying Providence based business. A few determined and politically connected neighbors have used a technicality to overturn the zoning boards varience decision.

The legal costs and delays to opening a store that has a seasonally driven business will cost the owner Drake Patten a large amount of money. The zoning costs and fighting to keep the granted varience has cost Cluck well over $10,000 dollars so far.

We seek to provide a small amount of funds to support Drake in her fight or if she decides that she cannot proceed to reduce the legal fees she has already incurred. 

What We Need & What You Get

This effort is a small one started by independent community members to show our support for the fight. We recognize it will be a drop in the bucket in the total costs to get this business open. 

At the end of the campaign all funds will be given directly to Drake Patten or Cluck and you get the satisfaction of knowing you helped in the fight.

The Impact

Every dollar given is a dollar that supports a small business trying to make meaningful change in the city of Providence.

story:
Niilaser is a personal desktop laser engraving system.

The art of engraving has evolved alongside the progression of technology. In the beginning, engravers etched the work of artists onto paper and wood. Then those who forged metals learned to inscribe their marks into their products. Over time, engravers found they could work with a variety of materials including glass, leather, and plastic.

Now we’ve reached the day and age where an engraver doesn’t need a professional lab or company to get the job done. The problem is, personal engraving equipment has been way too hard on the wallet for hardware fans to afford. To help them out, we’ve created the first laser engraving machine that costs less than $100! You can make your own engravings in the comfort of your home with our easy-to-use and affordable solution.


How the NiiLaser Works

The NiiLaser is the result of tech-savvy innovation bringing a low-cost solution to hardware and technical enthusiasts everywhere. As compact as a laptop and user-friendly as a printer, you’ll be making your own engravings within one minute of using the NiiLaser for the first time! The laser gives you computer-aided precision, turning you into a master engraver.

Engraving Pcb Broad


Engraving Bamboo


Engraving Cowhide 


We Need Your Help.

Through seven months of hard work, we have finally finished the sample test. We still need funds to complete the first round of bulk production, as well as promote and market the NiiLaser. We’d like to offer as many incentives as possible for those who are able to donate the money we will need to make this happen. The more we can produce in a single run, the cheaper the price per unit will be! Take advantage of the special low prices we are offering during this campaign, because you won’t always be able to get the NiiLaser this cheap.

The funds gathered from this campaign will produce our first round of bulk production, invest in our next solution to the high cost of 3D printers and 4-axis aircraft, and contribute to letting tech and hardware fans around the world know that the NiiLaser exists.



Machine Data:

1) Machine size: 140mm x 150mm x 165mm

2) Working area: 40mm x 40mm

3) Working height : 40mm

4) Engraving precision: 0.1mm

5) Operating system:Windows XP/Vista/7/8 *

*The Grbl Control Software, it  uses standard G-Code to interpret designs. In Inkscape,you can draw; use your desired patterns, and designs to engrave or cut with your NiiLaser. 

Tell Your Friends

If you’ve ever dreamed you could afford a top-of-the-line laser engraving machine, then you should already see the enormous value of the NiiLaser. We’d like to serve as an inspiration for other entrepreneurs and startup enterprises to get out there and release their innovations to the world through the crowdfunding model. We know a lot of people who need a solution like this, so tell your friends to contribute so we can promote it to the world. Sharing this campaign on your social media profile is just as valuable to us as an actual financial pledge.



FAQ

PURCHASING AND SHIPPING(Shipping dates, Warranty)

When will I receive my Niilaser?

We are doing our utmost to have the Niilaser shipping in time for Christmas. We will provide continuous updates about the production schedule during and after the campaign. The projected timelines mentioned for each perk will be firmed up over the coming weeks. 

Is there a warranty for the Core?  

Yes, the Niilaser comes with a one-year replacement warranty.

We will provide quality warranty for all our products, continuously upgrade our hardware and software and supply spare parts.

story:
Help us Kick Start a New Tradition – 1st Philadelphia Brazilian Day

Philadelphia will celebrate the first Brazilian Day this September at Penn’s Landing, and you’re invited! Mark your calendar! Brazilian Day Philadelphia will take place Sunday, September 21, 2014 from 1 - 7 pm on the Great Plaza in Penn's Landing. As part of the PECO Multicultural Festival Series that started in 1994, Brazilian Day promises to become an integral part of the fabric of Philadelphia's ethnic communities. It is free to the public!


Our mission

Brazilian Day Philadelphia is the celebration of the Brazilian Independence Day.  The mission of Brazilian Day Philadelphia is to celebrate the wonderful culture and traditions of Brazil and to share with the public the diverse ethnic heritage that makes Brazil unique and rich in cultural pride.  We aspire to unify the Brazilian community by showcasing and supporting its talents and local businesses. Vendors will offer an abundant variety of authentic traditional foods and merchandise and performers will light up the stage with the contagious rhythms and dances of Brazil. The festival will feature a unique blend of Brazilian culture and showcase: Samba, Forro, Pagode, Capoeira, Samba-Reggae and more. We hope that you will join us for a fun-filled day to celebrate the music, dance, food and pride of the Brazilian community. Brazilian Day Philadelphia is the place to be on Sunday, September 21, 2014!

Brazilian Fest Added to Delaware Riverfront Summer Activities


Who we are

This event is brought to you by Project Capoeira, PECO, and the Delaware River Waterfront Corporation. At Project Capoeira, we are proud to organize this event. The mission of Project Capoeira, Inc., a 501(C)(3) non-profit organization, is to preserve, develop, and share the art of Capoeira, an Afro-Brazilian art form. Through instruction and demonstration, Project Capoeira fosters community and inter-cultural understanding and builds confidence and positive citizenship among all groups, including under-served communities and Latino youth. Now in existence for 13 years, Project Capoeira is the only non-profit organization dedicated to bringing the rich artistic tradition of Capoeira to the Philadelphia area, and we are a pioneering force in the preservation and development of Brazilian culture in the region.

How you can help make this happen  

Brazilian Day Philadelphia aims to bring the best of Brazil to Philadelphia by celebrating the rich culture and diverse ethnic heritage that makes Brazil special. Although this project represents our largest and most costly undertaking, we believe in the importance of building community and enriching lives through the arts. Due to the fact that many large corporations have the policy of not providing financial support to events that have not been around for a period of years, we are faced with the challenge of finding sponsorship outside of the group of companies that already sponsor the events within the PECO Multicultural Festival Series. As a small, non-profit organization, Project Capoeira needs your help to raise the funds needed to produce this festival as it is free to the public. 

You have a unique opportunity to kick start a new tradition and showcase the Brazilian culture by supporting Philadelphia’s very first Brazilian Day, which promises to grow in size and popularity for years to come. All donations are tax-deductible. Event proceeds will support Project Capoeira.

Your donation will help us pay for event expenses, which include:

  • Performer fees
  • Instrument rentals
  • Stage and Great Plaza area decorations
  • City permits and event insurance
  • Emergency Medical Services
  • Media and marketing materials and related fees (e.g. website, TV commercial, brochures)

We hope that you can celebrate the day with us and hope you are able to help us start a new tradition by donating your money. If you are unable to donate your money, please help us get the word out, make some noise about the campaign, and consider donating your time as a volunteer for the event (see event website to register). We appreciate your time and consideration. Thank you in advance for your generosity.

If you'd like to make a monetary donation, but don't feel comfortable to do so online via credit card, please make a check payable to "Project Capoeira" and mail to the address below. 

Delphine Dos Santos
Chief Managing Director
Project Capoeira, Inc.
1213 Race Street, Ground Floor, Philadelphia, PA19107
215-601-9117, 215-317-1392
BrazilianDayPhiladelphia@gmail.com

Due to the fact that many large corporations have the policy of not providing financial support to events that have not been around for a period of years, we are faced with the challenge of finding sponsorship outside of the group of companies that already sponsor the events within the PECO Multicultural Festival Series. As a small, non-profit organization, Project Capoeira needs your help to raise the funds needed to produce this festival as it is free to the public. 
You have a unique opportunity to kick start a new tradition and showcase
the Brazilian culture by supporting Philadelphia’s very first Brazilian Day,
which promises to grow in size and popularity for years to come. All donations
are tax-deductible. Event proceeds will support Project Capoeira.
Your donation will help us pay for event expenses, which include: 


Performer fees

Instrument rentals

Stage and Great Plaza area decorations

City permits and event insurance

Emergency Medical Services


Media and marketing materials and related fees (e.g. website,
TV commercial, brochures)

We hope that you can celebrate the day with us and hope you are able to
help us start a new tradition by donating your money. If you are unable to donate your money, please help us get the word out, make some noise about the campaign, and consider donating your time as a volunteer for the event (see event website to register). We appreciate your time and consideration. Thank you in advance for your generosity.If you'd like to make a monetary donation, but don't feel comfortable to do so online via credit card, please make a check payable to "Project Capoeira" and mail to the address below. Delphine Dos SantosChief Managing DirectorProject Capoeira, Inc.1213 Race Street, Ground Floor, Philadelphia, PA19107215-601-9117, 215-317-1392BrazilianDayPhiladelphia@gmail.com

story:
Hello, and thanks for stopping by..

In case you weren't sure after the video, my name is... Richard Brownsdon. 

I'm passionate about connecting you with the amazing work that inspiring social entrepreneurs are doing all around the world. It's my aim to introduce you to their work, and encourage you to start your own projects that make the world a better place.  

  • I've been working on my Inspiring Adventures project for almost exactly one year to achieve this, with both successes and failures. 
  • I've run successful events in London with Hub Westminster, Escape the City and others, and you can see more videos of my work here on pinterest. 
  • I'm crowd funding to help support the first international Inspiring Adventure.  In October 2012, I designed a learning journey around Brazil. You can see the original video I made for that here. I failed to find enough people to join me, maybe because of that video, so now I'm going to do it myself, and make it 5 times more Inspiring and Adventurous!

The Inspiring Adventure

Brazil is the 5th largest country in the world by area, the 5th largest by population, and some time in 2013, it's going to become the 5th largest economy.  The country has raised 40 million people out of poverty in the last decade alone. It's an emerging super power and is going to be the host of the next World Cup and the next Olympic Games. 

From February 5th to March 15th, I'll be spending 5 weeks on an Inspiring Adventure around all 5 regions of Brazil.

My goal is to meet social entrepreneurs and amazing people working on inspiring projects in every region, and to share their stories with you.  Of course I'll also be having adventures along the way..

You can see my work-in-progress itinerary here on Google Docs.

What I Need & What You Get

As well as my international flights, I'm putting in £1500 of my own money for this Inspiring Adventure.  I don't think anyone should pay for me to have a holiday, so I am of course covering all my own food, drink and fun weekend activities.

But I won't be able to achieve my mission to get to meet social entrepreneurs in all 5 regions within 5 weeks without your help.

What I'll be spending money on:

  • Supporting social enterprises. I want to support the projects of the social entrepreneurs I meet. I want to purchase the services or products they offer, give them a gift, or give them a small donation. 
  • Transport. Brazil is a huge country, and getting around it in 5 weeks is going to be expensive. Where possible, I'll use local transport, but severals legs of the journey will require internal flights and other methods.
  • Accommodation. When I can, I'll be couchsurfing, but that works best in the big cities. At other times, I plan to stay in sustainable, community owned hostels.

What you get:

£10 - Inspiration.

Be inspired to start your own adventure. Receive a postcard (remember those?) from the journey and one of my favourite inspiring quotes. Guaranteed to cheer you up on a random February or March afternoon! 

£25 - Support Social Enterprise

Here's one to get excited about. The above inspiration, plus a unique gift picked out just for you.  Where possible, it will be from one of the social enterprises visited, and will include the story of how this gift for you is making the world a better place. Think cool T-shirt, hand made scarf, or local jewellery.. 

£100 - Learn How To Do It

All the above, plus I'll help you design your own Inspiring Adventure. Whether you want a day out in London, or a trip around the the world, we'll create a plan through skype and email.  I'll answer your questions, and connect you with the right people to make it happen.

£1000 - Be Famous

Inspiring Adventures Brazil,
Supported by YOUR (COMPANY) NAME HERE.

My past work has been seen by tens of thousands of people. From videos and blog posts on my own website, to social media shout outs and posts on the websites of Virgin, Escape The City, ClearlySo and other international blogs. 

Your support at this level will see your name permanently on the Inspiring Adventures website and in the blog and social media coverage of Inspiring Adventures Brazil. 

Free - Keep Up To Date

Want to hear how it all goes and keep up to date with the latest news?  Join the Inspiring Adventures Newsletter for free here.

Even if I don't reach my crowdfunding goal, I'm definitely going to Brazil, and you'll still get your rewards. If you are not interested in the rewards, dear friends, you can still contribute and you don't have to claim them.  

The Impact

It's my aim to inspire more people to start and join projects that make the world a better place.  

What is a social enterprise anyway?  Here's a little video a recorded last summer.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t donate, that's totally cool. If you think some of your friends may be interested in Inspiring Adventures, I'd really appreciate a little tweet here or a little facebook share there.

Something like this, delete as appropriate:

"My (friend/son/lover) Richard is about to take an (Inspiring Adventure/Journey/Jolly) around Brazil.  Have a look at his (silly/funny/beachy) video and maybe grab yourself some perks. I did, because I (love/hate/am crazy about) him."

Or for the more copy and paste inclined:

"Richard @Brownsdon is taking @inspadventures around Brazil. Check out his #SocEnt crowdfunding, & get some perks! http://ow.ly/gLXit"

There are some links at the top of the page.. It all helps!

Thanks a million.

story:
What are NCDs?

Non-Communicable Diseases, or heart disease, diabetes, cancers and lung diseases kill more people than any other cause worldwide - more than 36 million people each year.

Most of these deaths occur in the world’s poorest communities
and the worst part - the vast majority of these deaths can be avoided. 

 

Help us change this.

                                       
 
We are two brothers - Sandro, a medical doctor and Giuseppe, a designer and creative director. One of us works with communities and governments and the other works with giant companies.
 
Together with the global Young Professionals Chronic Disease Network, we want to give a voice to those affected by these diseases - celebrating and profiling the brilliant work of local NCD change-makers in Bangladesh, Mongolia, Kenya and more... 

 

Our goal.

The head of the United Nations said when it comes to NCDs, we know what we need to do... now we need to find the political and social support to do it!

This social movement aims to do just that! To make NCDs globally understood and start a wave of social and political change.

Teaming up with Harvard, The University of Melbourne, Local Peoples Consulting and more, to give a voice to NCDs and local NCD heroes... to start something HUGE!

 

Our Solution.

1. Build a social and political voice for NCDs

Connect a network of global citizens – supporting those affected by and solving NCDs in the planet’s poorest communities. Rallying people like you to lend us your ears and help spread the word.

2. Create a series of short films

We will shoot THREE short films in three developing countries, focusing on inspiring, local change-makers who are bringing health to their communities with NCD solutions of worldwide importance.

Through celebrating their stories we will help a larger audience understand the challenges and opportunities - and how everyone can play a role.

3. Bring together leading Changemakers

Using your donations, we will also bring together 10+ of the brightest change-makers and innovators from developing nations working to address NCDs in their communities. On stage at Harvard University, and The University of Melbourne, they will share their ideas and engage a global audience. 

Calls for action & support from the frontline, we will film our change-makers and put their calls online to...

4. Create an online advocacy hub for NCDs

Their challenges, innovations and calls for support will be available to anyone worldwide, to watch, share & be inspired. This will cultivate the sharing of ideas, build social and political support and see these local heroes rally a global audience.

 

We need your support.

We have a dedicated team of professionals who have donated their time and resources, but we need your help to cover some costs to make all this possible.

Costs to create 3 films and profile change-makers in Bangladesh, Mongolia and Kenya, including:

  1. Travel & insurances to three developing countries
  2. Equipment hire
  3. Editing for 3 films

Costs of bringing the 10+ young change-makers from developing countries, to Boston to call for action & share their ideas:

  1. Flights
  2. Accommodation

The more money we raise, the more change-makers we can bring to tell their stories!

An extra $2,500 will get one more inspiring NCD hero to Boston to call for action for their community... $12,000 extra and we can film and profile another community-in-need!

 

Other Ways You Can Help...

Please spread the word!

Tweet, Facebook or email your friends.. Tell them about this project and the change it will bring.. It is only possible with your help!

 

www.ncdfree.org

story:
The Project
In 2011, La Semilla received a 14 acre farmland donation so we could fulfill our vision of creating a vibrant youth education and demonstration farm. We have secured the well permit, completed a farm plan, and are working closely with an engineer to design the well and irrigation system.  We can't transition into production without the irrigation well – and this is where you come in. 

We need your help, and your friends’ help, and your friends’ friends’ help, to raise enough $ to drill the well!

With YOUR help, we can tap the source of water necessary for our growth and create opportunities for youth. This is especially pressing with the drought affecting our ability to acquire surface water. The well will be 250 feet deep with a casing and pump sufficient to provide life-giving water for youth to learn, grow, and market produce in our communities along the U.S.-Mexico border in southern New Mexico.

The Farm
La Semilla Youth Farm will increase access to fresh and locally grown produce for families, provide access to sustainable agriculture training opportunities, and grow a new generation of farmers, food activists, and engaged community members who recognize the connections between our food, land, and health.

The farm will serve multiple rural communities, as well as the metropolitan areas of Las Cruces, NM and El Paso, TX. La Semilla Youth Farm will provide a land base from which we can grow and market healthy fruits and vegetables, generating income to provide continued support for our youth programs in sustainable agriculture and food systems change.

We can’t wait to engage youth in intensive production, marketing, media literacy, nutrition, cooking, and food systems education on the farm…but first, we need an irrigation well!!!

Please contribute today.

story:
Angling International "Tackobox Poletap Smartrod designer is deadly serious"

CNET "Computerized fishing rod won't put worms on hooks"

OUTDOORHUB "Kansas Inventor Introduces Computerized Fishing Rod, the SmartRod"

HIGHT3CH "World's First Computerized Fishing Rod"

The INQUISTR "Introducing The Computerized Rod SMARTROD"

Gizmag "A computerized fishing rod-sure, why not?"

Ubergizmo "Smartrod Could Be Future of Fishing"

Canadian Council of the blind

Disabled World.com

TACKOBOX POLETAP SMARTROD is the Worlds First And Only Computerized Fishing Pole! It will let you know if you get a bite by way of a light and sound alert or light only alert. It's so smart it will automatically turn off the alert as you reel in the fish so as not to interfere with your fishing experience. The SMARTROD also has a digital readout for High Med or Low sensitivity settings. The H M L display will flash green every 12 seconds to let you know what sensitivity setting you are in as well as letting you know the rod is on and searching for activity from your fish. When in the designing stages of our rod simplicity of use was a priority. All operations of functions are from a one-button concept. To turn it on simply push the button and pick which sensitivity setting you desire. As an example of our technology when in High sensitivity setting you can just lightly touch the tip and it will go off yet still be able to hold the rod and walk around without setting off the alert. You can use Medium and Low settings for wind, waves, trolling, heavy rain or fishing in current. If you are fishing in rain  it's no problem, POLETAP SMARTROD is water resistant. This is the world’s first and only programmable fishing rod using Computer Controlled Accelerometer Technology protected by way of our full utility patent, design patent as well as software copyrights and trademarks. These rods would be a great gift for any angler in your family or fisherman using multiple rods. It is the ideal choice for catfish, striper and other freshwater and saltwater game fish. This technology is also perfectly in line with european carp fishermen being that the alarm is built into the rod with no need to purchse any extra accessories or attachments. It also works well for fishermen with disabilities. We want people who are visual or hearing impaired to know fishing is a sport that is available to them. Enjoying fresh air and the great outdoors is a treasured American pastime. Outdoor activities can help improve mental, spiritual and physical wellness. It is an important part of maintaining our quality of life

 

We Need Your Help!

We are making this product available on Indiegogo and we need your help. You can help bring POLETAP SMARTROD products and technologies to the world by being one of the first to own one!  While we are close to starting production your contribution would help fund: 

-Large Component Orders 

-Future Implementation to Retail

-Development of Multiple Rod Types

 • QUICK REFERENCE • 

SPINNING ROD uses a SPINNING REEL with no cast button.

SPINCAST ROD with TRIGGER uses a SPINCAST REEL with a button to cast.

REWARD SELECTION

 

Design 

We took a simplistic approach to every aspect of this project. We wanted the product to have a sleek blended look to closely match the visual of a typical rod yet still give the feeling that there is something else there. From the programming of software to the one button design we were always focused on high technology through ease of use. Even the button is designed so it cannot be activated in error while fighting your fish. Our design is actually quite complicated if you consider the amount of space available for components and assembly along with the need for it to be water resistant. I feel we have succeeded in creating a product that has technology yet it is simple to use and easy to understand. 

Sounds 

The sounds the SMARTROD makes are also very important to us. We tested many different speakers, volumes and tones. We wanted to be sure our product produced quality sounds in the way of professional devices like sonar or even medical equipment. We did not want it to sound like a typical buzzer or video game. Each function needed to have its own unique sound.  The output alarm volume had to be audible at a great distance and still have the ability to alert with light only. Our technology is intelligent and the sounds it makes should be as such.

 

MULTIPLE ROD FUNCTIONS 

- ADJUSTABLE SENSITIVITY HIGH -MED - LOW 

- PRESET ANGLE SETTING FOR SLOW PULLING FISH TILT- MODE 

-  LIGHTS AND SOUND ALERT 

-  LIGHTS ALERT ONLY 

- AUTO TEMPORARY SHUTDOWN WHEN REELING IN FISH 

- AUTO RESET AFTER RECASTING 

- AUTO COMPLETE SHUTDOWN IF NO ACTIVITY IN ONE HOUR 

- MEMORY SAVES LAST SETTING WHEN TURNED OFF 

- DISPLAY LIGHT FLASHES EVERY 12 SECONDS AND  LETS USER KNOW THE UNIT IS ON AND SEARCHING 

- POWERDOWN SOUND/LIGHT SEQUENCE- NO ACTIVITY AFTER ONE HOUR  

- DEDICATED SOUNDS FOR EACH FUNCTIONAL ADJUSTMENT

FEATURES

 - WATER RESISTANT

 - 2 LONG LIFE CR2032 BATTERIES

- HIGH OUTPUT PIEZO SPEAKER

- 4 RED HIGH OUTPUT LED ALERTS

- 3 GREEN SURFACE MOUNT LED DISPLAY LIGHTS

- MICROCHIP PROCESSOR

-  ACCELEROMETER

FAQ 

Q. How long will it take for you to complete tooling?

A. Tooling is already completed and manufacturing is ready to go. The products we show in the video are turnkey retail ready rods and reels.

 

Q. Have you tested your technology for proof of design?

A. Our product and technology has been tested through many years of product development. We also have various stages of quality control in place.

 

Q. Why would I purchase this product when I'm the type of fisherman that likes to hold my rod so I can feel the fish bite?

A.The SMARTROD is perfect for those who fish with multiple poles.It's also a tool for those of us that have watched many a bell take a trip to Davy Jones Locker from the tip of our pole. 

 

Q. What is a utility patent and why is it so valuable?

A. Utility patents are the king of patents. In all the world, this kind of patent is the most valuable, especially if it is issued by the United States Patent Office. It is also the most difficult to obtain. http://www.new-inventions-success.com/Utility-Patent.html

 

Q. What assurances do you have that you will make your deadline?

A. We already have logistics as well as our partner company in place for shipping. We have worked with the same company since 2004 and have full confidence in our ability to get product to you in a timely manner.

 

Q. What type of batteries does the rod take?

A. The rod takes 2- included CR2032 lithium cell batteries available at most retail outlets.

 

Q. How long do the batteries last?

A. Roughly one to two fishing seasons depending on use.

 

Q. Is it water resistant?

A. Yes it was designed to be water resistant and can be fully used in rain.

 

Q. What information can you provide on the quality of the rod.

A. The quality of our TACKOBOX rods is equal to better than most major branded like rods in retail. The rod options are Spinning Rod, 7' 2-piece medium action with stainless steel guides and aluminum oxide inserts or Spincast Rod, 6'6”, 2-piece medium action with stainless steel guides and aluminum oxide inserts.

 

Q. What information can you provide on the quality of the reel?

A. The quality of our TACKOBOX reel is equal to better than most major branded like reels in retail. The spinning reel is a ball bearing design with Left / Right convertible retrieve. 4.9:1 Ratio, spooled with red 15 lb test line.

 

Q. Is this product technology available anywhere else in the world?

A. No, We are the inventors and have the exclusive rights to manufacture this product by way of patents, trademarks and software copyrights. Our full utility patent number granted is US 7,934,338

 

Q. I have seen the POLETAP brand used by a major fishing company, is this you?

A. Yes, we licensed another product to a major manufacture but the technology has nothing in common with these new rods that incorporate computer controlled accelerometer technology.

 

Q.Is it easy to use?

A. Yes it was designed for ease of use. Once you turn it on it does all the thinking so you can concentrate on catching fish.

 

Q. Why should I trust the TACKOBOX brand?

A. We have made a quality product (The Original POLTAP), for fishermen since 2004. We are a very small company and have used all our resources to develop, pursue and patent this new technology to be available at indiegogo.

 

Q. Can you turn off the sound and use only the light alert?

A. Yes, you just hold the button down until it goes silent and release the button. Then choose your Hi-Med or Low sensitivity setting.

 

Q. Can I use my existing reel with these rods?

A. Yes our rods are designed to work with any standard reels. The technology is completely in the rod and will work with any line or reel.

 

Q. Can I purchase multiple rods internationally?

A. Yes you can purchase 2 rods  together which will increase the shipping to $65.00 internationally. There is no purchase limit to free shipping in the United States. All rods are shipped  UPS Ground Traceable and Insured.

 

Q. Are the pictures of the rods actual photo's or digital images?

A. The pictures are actual photo's of the product.

 

Q.Can I use the SMARTROD without the bite detector?

A. Of course you can use the SMARTROD without turning it on. Even if you don't use the technology it's still a world class rod. 

 

Q. Is this rod for everybody?

A. This rod is great for the young and old. One of the great benefits of the sound and light alert is that it will assist people with visual and hearing impairments have a much more enjoyable fishing experience.

 

Q. I'm  a blogger or journalist, and I would like to contact TACKOBOX for more information?

A.You can contact us at ed.tackobox@yahoo.com. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
story_txt:
Angling International "Tackobox Poletap Smartrod designer is deadly serious"
CNET "Computerized fishing rod won't put worms on hooks"
OUTDOORHUB "Kansas Inventor Introduces Computerized Fishing Rod, the SmartRod"
HIGHT3CH "World's First Computerized Fishing Rod"
The INQUISTR "Introducing The Computerized Rod SMARTROD"

Gizmag "A computerized fishing rod-sure, why not?"


Ubergizmo "Smartrod Could Be Future of Fishing"

Canadian Council of the blind
Disabled World.com
TACKOBOX POLETAP SMARTROD is the Worlds First And Only Computerized Fishing Pole! It will let you know if you get a bite by way of a light and sound alert or light only alert. It's so smart it will automatically turn off the alert as you reel in the fish so as not to interfere with your fishing experience. The SMARTROD also has a digital readout for High Med or Low sensitivity settings. The H M L display will flash green every 12 seconds to let you know what sensitivity setting you are in as well as letting you know the rod is on and searching for activity from your fish. When in the designing stages of our rod simplicity of use was a priority. All operations of functions are from a one-button concept. To turn it on simply push the button and pick which sensitivity setting you desire. As an example of our technology when in High sensitivity setting you can just lightly touch the tip and it will go off yet still be able to hold the rod and walk around without setting off the alert. You can use Medium and Low settings for wind, waves, trolling, heavy rain or fishing in current. If you are fishing in rain  it's no problem, POLETAP SMARTROD is water resistant. This is the world’s first and only programmable fishing rod using Computer Controlled Accelerometer Technology protected by way of our full utility patent, design patent as well as software copyrights and trademarks. These rods would be a great gift for any angler in your family or fisherman using multiple rods. It is the ideal choice for catfish, striper and other freshwater and saltwater game fish. This technology is also perfectly in line with european carp fishermen being that the alarm is built into the rod with no need to purchse any extra accessories or attachments. It also works well for fishermen with disabilities. We want people who are visual or hearing impaired to know fishing is a sport that is available to them. Enjoying fresh air and the great outdoors is a treasured American pastime. Outdoor activities can help improve mental, spiritual and physical wellness. It is an important part of maintaining our quality of life
 
We Need Your Help!
We are making this product available on Indiegogo and we need your help. You can help bring POLETAP SMARTROD products and technologies to the world by being one of the first to own one!  While we are close to starting production your contribution would help fund: 
-Large Component Orders 
-Future Implementation to Retail
-Development of Multiple Rod Types
 • QUICK REFERENCE • 
SPINNING ROD uses a SPINNING REEL with no cast button.
SPINCAST ROD with TRIGGER uses a SPINCAST REEL with a button to cast.
REWARD SELECTION


 
Design 
We took a simplistic approach to every aspect of this project. We wanted the product to have a sleek blended look to closely match the visual of a typical rod yet still give the feeling that there is something else there. From the programming of software to the one button design we were always focused on high technology through ease of use. Even the button is designed so it cannot be activated in error while fighting your fish. Our design is actually quite complicated if you consider the amount of space available for components and assembly along with the need for it to be water resistant. I feel we have succeeded in creating a product that has technology yet it is simple to use and easy to understand. 
Sounds 
The sounds the SMARTROD makes are also very important to us. We tested many different speakers, volumes and tones. We wanted to be sure our product produced quality sounds in the way of professional devices like sonar or even medical equipment. We did not want it to sound like a typical buzzer or video game. Each function needed to have its own unique sound.  The output alarm volume had to be audible at a great distance and still have the ability to alert with light only. Our technology is intelligent and the sounds it makes should be as such.
 
MULTIPLE ROD FUNCTIONS 
- ADJUSTABLE SENSITIVITY HIGH -MED - LOW 
- PRESET ANGLE SETTING FOR SLOW PULLING FISH TILT- MODE 
-  LIGHTS AND SOUND ALERT 
-  LIGHTS ALERT ONLY 
- AUTO TEMPORARY SHUTDOWN WHEN REELING IN FISH 
- AUTO RESET AFTER RECASTING 
- AUTO COMPLETE SHUTDOWN IF NO ACTIVITY IN ONE HOUR 
- MEMORY SAVES LAST SETTING WHEN TURNED OFF 
- DISPLAY LIGHT FLASHES EVERY 12 SECONDS AND  LETS USER KNOW THE UNIT IS ON AND SEARCHING 
- POWERDOWN SOUND/LIGHT SEQUENCE- NO ACTIVITY AFTER ONE HOUR  
- DEDICATED SOUNDS FOR EACH FUNCTIONAL ADJUSTMENT
FEATURES
 - WATER RESISTANT
 - 2 LONG LIFE CR2032 BATTERIES
- HIGH OUTPUT PIEZO SPEAKER
- 4 RED HIGH OUTPUT LED ALERTS
- 3 GREEN SURFACE MOUNT LED DISPLAY LIGHTS
- MICROCHIP PROCESSOR
-  ACCELEROMETER
FAQ 
Q. How long will it take for you to complete tooling?
A. Tooling is already completed and manufacturing is ready to go. The products we show in the video are turnkey retail ready rods and reels.
 
Q. Have you tested your technology for proof of design?
A. Our product and technology has been tested through many years of product development. We also have various stages of quality control in place.
 
Q. Why would I purchase this product when I'm the type of fisherman that likes to hold my rod so I can feel the fish bite?
A.The SMARTROD is perfect for those who fish with multiple poles.It's also a tool for those of us that have watched many a bell take a trip to Davy Jones Locker from the tip of our pole. 
 
Q. What is a utility patent and why is it so valuable?
A. Utility patents are the king of patents. In all the world, this kind of patent is the most valuable, especially if it is issued by the United States Patent Office. It is also the most difficult to obtain. http://www.new-inventions-success.com/Utility-Patent.html
 
Q. What assurances do you have that you will make your deadline?
A. We already have logistics as well as our partner company in place for shipping. We have worked with the same company since 2004 and have full confidence in our ability to get product to you in a timely manner.
 
Q. What type of batteries does the rod take?
A. The rod takes 2- included CR2032 lithium cell batteries available at most retail outlets.
 
Q. How long do the batteries last?
A. Roughly one to two fishing seasons depending on use.
 
Q. Is it water resistant?
A. Yes it was designed to be water resistant and can be fully used in rain.
 
Q. What information can you provide on the quality of the rod.
A. The quality of our TACKOBOX rods is equal to better than most major branded like rods in retail. The rod options are Spinning Rod, 7' 2-piece medium action with stainless steel guides and aluminum oxide inserts or Spincast Rod, 6'6”, 2-piece medium action with stainless steel guides and aluminum oxide inserts.
 
Q. What information can you provide on the quality of the reel?
A. The quality of our TACKOBOX reel is equal to better than most major branded like reels in retail. The spinning reel is a ball bearing design with Left / Right convertible retrieve. 4.9:1 Ratio, spooled with red 15 lb test line.
 
Q. Is this product technology available anywhere else in the world?
A. No, We are the inventors and have the exclusive rights to manufacture this product by way of patents, trademarks and software copyrights. Our full utility patent number granted is US 7,934,338
 
Q. I have seen the POLETAP brand used by a major fishing company, is this you?
A. Yes, we licensed another product to a major manufacture but the technology has nothing in common with these new rods that incorporate computer controlled accelerometer technology.
 
Q.Is it easy to use?
A. Yes it was designed for ease of use. Once you turn it on it does all the thinking so you can concentrate on catching fish.
 
Q. Why should I trust the TACKOBOX brand?
A. We have made a quality product (The Original POLTAP), for fishermen since 2004. We are a very small company and have used all our resources to develop, pursue and patent this new technology to be available at indiegogo.
 
Q. Can you turn off the sound and use only the light alert?
A. Yes, you just hold the button down until it goes silent and release the button. Then choose your Hi-Med or Low sensitivity setting.
 
Q. Can I use my existing reel with these rods?
A. Yes our rods are designed to work with any standard reels. The technology is completely in the rod and will work with any line or reel.
 
Q. Can I purchase multiple rods internationally?
A. Yes you can purchase 2 rods  together which will increase the shipping to $65.00 internationally. There is no purchase limit to free shipping in the United States. All rods are shipped  UPS Ground Traceable and Insured.
 
Q. Are the pictures of the rods actual photo's or digital images?
A. The pictures are actual photo's of the product.
 
Q.Can I use the SMARTROD without the bite detector?
A. Of course you can use the SMARTROD without turning it on. Even if you don't use the technology it's still a world class rod. 
 
Q. Is this rod for everybody?
A. This rod is great for the young and old. One of the great benefits of the sound and light alert is that it will assist people with visual and hearing impairments have a much more enjoyable fishing experience.
 
Q. I'm  a blogger or journalist, and I would like to contact TACKOBOX for more information?
A.You can contact us at ed.tackobox@yahoo.com. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

story:
Mary Kay, Lia Sophia, Creative Memories, Pure Romance, Avon, Scentsy, Herbalife, Tupperware, Thirty One, Tastefully Simple, Amway, Arbonne International, The Pampered Chef are just a few companies that would benefit from Pocket Parties..

Inspiration from consultants in the trenches...

Motivated to make my wife's current ways of business better...

Designed and Developed by "Masters of the Universe"... we're that good!

 

Check out our features list:

Contact/Client information system

  • View Current orders, Open orders, and previous orders
  • Track friends for each customer/client and who was at the party
  • Poke them to let them know you are there, Twitter, Facebook, Email
  • Map their location
  • Keep notes about them
  • Are they a member of your team or not
  • Know which customer prefers email, text messaging, or phone followups
  • Search through messages, email, and phone calls for that client
  • Show/Print/Poke just your team members

Inventory tracking system

  • Add, delete, edit items
  • Create custom items
  • Get notified of low stock items
  • Logic to know what items are hot
  • Printing/Reporting capabilities
  • Download complete product catalogs into Inventory (Coming soon)

Create an order

  • Link to your customer or whether it was a sample/gift
  • Calculate the totals
  • Pull the items automatically from the inventory piece
  • Print and Email Receipt capabilities
  • Your logo on the receipt
  • Indicators to know if you have something in stock or not
  • Print all items needed for ordering or just a complete summary of the party

Map Optimization

  • Choose the folks you need to deliver to and let the map do the rest

Expense Tracking

  • Track Miles traveled and business expenses.
  • Print/Email report

Social Integration

  • Tweet and Post new items
  • Poke your customers to say hey or about a new offer
  • Notification for upcoming birthdays
  • Notification for stale customers

Every Consultant will be armed with this in their pocket!

History:

My wife currently sells Mary Kay. The whole reason she wants to do this is so she can help support the family financially while more importantly, raising our kids. This story is written across all of the companies just like Mary Kay. Independent Sales Consultants become independent sales consultants so they still feel they are supporting financially as well as raising the children. Of course there is a lot of money to be made if you are really good at team building and sales. After watching my wife go through her routines, I noticed a problem. Everything was ON PAPER! She would have piles of client cards and invoices. Customers would call and she would sift through all of it to find that customer. She never knew for sure if she had something in stock. I would always be mapping locations and addresses and trying to help her find her way... I found spending time with the family, was just not there. She spent all this time with her business and missed out on the fundamental reason why she was doing what she was doing in the first place. Spending time with the family


The Solution:

The solution was simple. She needed an application that could store her clients information in one place and be able to access it at anytime. She needed a way to keep track of all the orders a client had and what products to make re-orders easy. She needed a way to poke people, and remind people she was there to help them with their needs. She needed an easier way to send receipts, keep track of inventory, and know what's selling and what's not. She needed a way to optimize her 4 deliveries for that day instead of driving around town. She needed the 8 apps out there that do this to be in one. Pocket Parties does that! We have developed a way to keep track of all of this in one place.


Rewards

EarlyBird is $35, $50 Reward
EarlyBird is $35, $50 Reward
EarlyBird is $70, $85 Reward
EarlyBird is $125 $145 Reward


Where the money goes:

Design

Design is important in any app as you want it to flow and be easy on the eyes. Sketching out prototypes and wiping them clean to start all over is just part of the process. We will have a team of designers and focus groups to help us determine if the design is practical for what we are trying to accomplish.

Development

As tricky as development is, it is important to find the right people to make this application. I, myself, cannot do this by myself. As someone that knows  how extensive coding can be, a team of brains is better than one. I have come up with that team and the portfolio is amazing. What we will be able to do will be endless!

Apple

Great design and development is expensive, and Apple and Google will take some of the funds. The App Store and Google Play will be the only means to distribute the app to customers so there is going to be a huge slice off every download. $7,500 is my goal and nearly 10-12% of that will get chopped off the top after we pay the dues here.. So this and Apple, does not leave me a ton of wiggle room, but I can get it done with your help!

Marketing

Our left over funds, excess money raised, will help push our app even further as we will utilize ads and other marketing strategies to jump start the application further.


ETA

May 2013

story:
Who am I?

Hi, I’m Kerry Smith – owner of Primrose & Finch, lover of all things pretty, feminine and vintage, mum to four beautiful children and wife to my gorgeous husband!!

Inspired by my English heritage, I opened Primrose & Finch to bring the world’s most beautiful vintage inspired wedding dresses to Parnell, Auckland, where both New Zealand and Australian brides can find their perfect gown.

Our exclusive collection features wedding dresses and bridal accessories from designers around the world – including Claire Pettibone, Charlie Brear, Joanne Fleming Design, Belle & Bunty, Katya Katya Shehurina, Enchanted Atelier, Jo Barnes Vintage, Silver Sixpence in her Shoe, HM Veils & Rachel Simpson Bridal Shoes.

We believe that shopping for your wedding dress should be a wonderful experience and is one where you should be able to view and try on bridal gowns that not only look good, feel amazing but are also made to the highest quality standard - after all - it is your special day!!! 

After two years of successful trading we are now in an expansion phase where we need to access funds to bring in some incredible designers that New Zealand has never seen before. These designers gowns are sure to wow!!!! and I am sure that many of you will be so so thrilled to see them hitting New Zealand Shores.

Some of our Brides


What We Need & What You Get

To enable us to bring in some of these amazing wedding dresses to New Zealand we need to find an extra US$10000. This isn't a huge amount as we have managed to fund this whole project ourselves through incredibly long hours, amazing creativity within our team and thorough dedication and love towards our brand.

We do however have a time limit on this - 45 days!!! As I am sure Brides will want to order these gowns in time for the New Zealand Summer 2014/2015 Wedding Season!!

And now the perks!!

Thankyou!! $5

Shout it from the roof tops!! $10

Shoes, shoes, shoes!! $20

A girls best friend!! $50

To have and to hold!! $100

I'll love you to the moon and back!! $250

I do!! $500

Lets celebrate!! $1000

Everlasting love!! $2500

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that no matter how much you want to help, sometimes you just can't, which is why we'll be just as greatful to you for spreading the word and helping us reach our funding goal. We've only got 45 days so please share this wherever and whenever you can by following us on Twitter, @primroseandfinch, Facebook, Primrose & Finch or sharing the link to our campaign.

If you are a professional and would like to donate your services either to us directly or for us to offer as a perk, please contact us directly at kerry@primroseandfinch.com.

Thank you so much. xxxx

story:
What We Do

Hounds Helping Heroes is an organization in its earliest stages, with a goal of training and placing service dogs with Veterans dealing with PTSD as well as individuals on the Autistic Spectrum, under our Pups for Pals program. Even though we are just getting started, we already have so many people who have reached out for help from 3 different states!

We have already obtained Incorporation, and are working on our 501(c)3 non profit status. We want to get started helping these individuals that so desperately could use one of our dogs. In order to do this, we need to raise the funds to obtain our training facility, purchase basic training tools such as harnesses, vests for the dogs and even food to feed the dogs while we train them. (Service dogs take MONTHS of training, which can add up on costs quickly!)

By helping us get started, so many others will be helped in the months and even years to come. Not only are those who receive the dogs being served, but our mission is to temperament test and train rescued shelter dogs rather than going to breeders. This saves on costs as well as saving an animals life!


What will the funds go toward? 

We are very excited, as many individuals have contacted us for service dogs. At this time we are working out of improvised spaces, and definitely need to acquire a space to make this organization come to light! Items we are in need of funding for are, 

  • Basic training tools such as leashes, harnesses, treats and vests.
  • Dog supplies such as bowls and food as well as money to pay for basic vet care.
  • Rent for our new facility as well as basic maintenance.
  • Since this amount is only a partial funding endeavor, every penny raised, no matter how much, will go directly to Hounds Helping Heroes Inc. to better the lives of others.

The Impact

Think the amount you can spare is not enough? Absolutely not true! Every Dollar helps and every Penny is appreciated!

by lemonwood_design.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn't mean you can’t help! Here are some ways you can help us in other ways.

  • Help us get the word out about our campaign! Share our cause on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Blog or any other form of social media you use! You can even use Indigogo's share tools to make it super simple!
  • Spread our mission with your friends by telling them about us or showing them our website. If you know someone who may be interested in helping our organization, let them know! 
  • Know someone who could use our services? Send them our way too!
  • Check out our Amazon Wish List! There are lots of ways to help!

story:
We (Árpád Kovács, Mariana Machado, Zoltán Dianovsky)  are three international volunteers who are going to Chibombo (Zambia).


Our goal is to fundraise 3500€ so we can buy 9 bikes with trailer, one bike with a special trailer which can be used to transport people in emergency, and tool kits for each bike and trailer.

With them, local people can transport water, food, start their own business or even be easily transported to the nearest clinic/hospital.


The Impact

- Transport

Our aim is to solve the mobility problems that people have in rural areas. In those areas, people have to walk long distances to get water or to transport goods. With bikes and trailers, people can transport water and other goods more easily.

This way, they can reduce the time and the energy they spend with finding and fetching water. This means that people can spend more time with their family, go to school, play, find a job or create their own activity.


- People in emergency

As there is no doctor around in most of the time and the hospitals are far away from many communities, we want to provide the communities an emergency trailer where people in emergency can be transported.


- Support local business

Zambikes is the company which provides these items. This company is a social and local business and if we reach our goal, we (and you) will support it.


- Education

We want to create a cooperative so people can share these items in the community. At the same time, we are going to teach people about how to repair bikes and trailers and to promote income generating activities.

We are also going to teach people about health and sanitation and about how to deal with emergencies.

As we will be working with pre-schools, schools, women clubs and youth clubs, we believe that we can mobilize the community through meetings, presentations, workshops, games and practical activities. This way, people can not only use this system after we leave, but they can also serve as an example for nearest communities.

   

What we need

- 9 bikes + trailers


- 1 Zambulance (Bike + emergency trailer)

- Tool Kits for each bike and trailer


 

 Other Ways You Can Help 

 

- Share this page on your Facebook, Twitter or Google+

- Visit our facebook page http://www.facebook.com/12bike

Any queries, contact : 12bikeproject@gmail.com

story:
Fortune Cookie Soap Retail is like no other retail bath + body store. (thank goodness!)

 Our names are Justin and Shannon Prokop, we are the owners of Fortune Cookie Soap.

 After making and selling soap for 7 years, both online and wholesale, we realized, now is time to take it to the next level. FCS GOES RETAIL!!!! For those of you that know us, you know you don't have to worry about this being, your average retail soap shop. (Granny's Soap Shoppe *cough cough*) 

 We plan on making our store a futuristic type reflection of our current social media pages. Kinda like social media - IN ACTION!! Very interactive and hands on. Social media is HUGE for us, and the reason we are where we are. We have a rabidly loyal online community, affectionately dubbed "Fortunefreaks", that are coming along for the wild ride. 

 You might be thinking to yourself, "Why should I donate, I don't even live in Tulsa." Good point! Our online Fortunefreaks are going to be a HUUUGE part of our retail store...

  1.  We will have a store webcam that we will turn on periodically, for all those voyeurs out there that like to watch. (We know you're out there!)
  2. Large flat panels displaying our different social media platforms that we are active on. Our local customers will be able to check in, share pictures and get advice from our online community, effectively growing our community until we take over the world. ;) 
  3. There will be a graffiti wall for customers to sign. "______ was here!"
  4. Another large flat panel will be playing all of our Youtube reviews, helping the reviewer gain exposure and aiding the newbies in choosing their products.

 Our fundraising goal has been set at the minimum level at which we can open this retail location.  A plan dependent on awesome perks, breaking rules, and a general attitude of "let's just do this, come hell or high water!" Should we exceed our goal rest assured that the money will go to the other 1,000 things that we didn't foresee.  In the event that we fall short of our goal we will put the funds raised, towards a smaller crappier location. BUT LET"S NOT THINK LIKE THAT!  

The bottom line is, we're opening a retail location and every additional dollar allows us to minimize compromises and maximize awesomeness. So, if you're a new backer contemplating donating, please come aboard. And if you're already a backer, well, hold onto your sparkly FCS shirt, because it's full steam ahead!

Our goal is to open by June 1st. Donations to this campaign will go towards...

  • a retail sign (our first quote was for $10,000-$15,000!!! *faints*)
  • patching and painting the store
  • a POS system 
  • store fixtures
  • a new computer
  • utility and lease deposits
  • a checkout counter
  • building our inventory
  • flat panels
  • a commercial sink
  • employee uniforms
  • custom wall paper (seriously ROCKS!!)

Plus the 1,000 things that we didn't plan on. Is that it?? Wow, I sure hope so! 

How IndieGoGo works: You decide how much you want to donate and choose an associated perk. When our campaign ends, IndieGoGo takes a 4% fee of the money we’ve raised. Roughly $17,670 is the difference. If we don't reach our goal, the fee is 9% (which might not sound like much, but end up being a lot! Another reason why it's important we reach our goal!).  Another 3% or so also goes to IndieGoGo for cc processing fees. But everything else will go straight to opening the retail store. 

 If you aren't in a position to support us financially at this time, that's okay! You can still support us by spreading the word about it using the share tools here on IndieGoGo. Ready, set, SHARE!! <3

If you've made it all the way to the end of this long winded post..

THANK YOU!!! Every little bit helps. Seriously.

story:
Semaine israélienne à INSEAD 

L'école de commerce mondialement reconnue tourne au bleu et blanc!

16-20 avril, 2012 | En France (Fontainebleau) et à Singapour 

  

C'est officiel! Cette année, les étudiants de MBA a l’INSEAD ont voté pour la semaine israélienne: une fête annuelle de cinq jours dédiée à Israël, sa culture, sa cuisine, son monde des affaires et son énergie. Cependant, nous avons besoin de votre aide pour menez ce projet à bien...

 

L'organisation de semaines nationales est une vielle tradition à l’INSEAD, la prestigieuse école de commerce internationale. Pour nous, les étudiants israéliens, il s’agit d’une occasion unique de présenter les atouts économiques, culturels et humains d’Israel a des centaines d’étudiants en MBA venant de plus de 70 pays à travers le monde. Nous vous invitons à sponsoriser une semaine exceptionnelle  pour célébrer Israël: Start Up Nation.

 

Ceci est une opportunité de montrer ce qu'Israël a de mieux à offrir!  

 

Avec votre aide, nous amènerons l'esprit israélien sur le campus avec de la nourriture israélienne, des conférenciers, des hommes d'affaires, de la danse traditionnelle, de la culture et plus encore!

 

_______________________________________________________________________

 

Israel Week at INSEAD 

The World’s top Business School wears Blue and White!

16-20 of April, 2012 | Hosted in France (Fontainebleau) and Singapore 

 

 

It's official and exciting! It's the continuation of an incredible tradition! This year, the students of INSEAD have voted again to hold Israel Week -- an annual five day celebration devoted to learning about the culture, food, business environment and vibrancy of Israel. But we need your help to pull it off

 

 

Hosting national weeks is a long lasting tradition at INSEAD, the world’s leading international business school. For us, the Israeli students, it is a unique opportunity to expose 1000 top MBA students from from over 70 countries to the best Israeli has to offer. We invite you to help sponsor this exceptional week and celebration of Israel.

 This is our opportunity to show the best Israel has to offer! 

With your help we can bring the Israeli spirit to campus with Israeli food, guest speakers, business panels, traditional dancing, culture and much much more!
